Even though there are many parts to the electronic hub of SBB, there 
is nothing special that doesn't already exist. All those parts are 
available from multiple manufacturers - no special parts need to be 
"invented" for this device to be produced. Therefore, the real challenge
 is not to "invent something new" but rather use existing parts and put 
them together in high-quality reliable package. 
Manufacturing of a product such as Smart Back Brace is a daunting 
task. That is why we let professionals do it. While our team has 
extensive knowledge of electronics engineering, manufacturing 
electronics is a different ball game. We are currently contacting 
several manufacturers to review our designs and fabricate SBB on a large
 scale – 10,000+ units. Additionally, we are contacting a third party 
engineering firm to help us with design of Bluetooth, as well as 
procedures to pass FCC regulations which are required for all 
electronics sold in the U.S.A. 
Once the design is approved, prototypes are fully tested and 
manufacturing agreement signed, we do not expect any delays or problems.
 However, production will require a 60 days lead time to create molds 
and lining up all of electronic components. 
Fulfillment:
Depending on which manufacturer we use, the shipment of orders will 
vary. But we will make sure that we have good suppliers with robust 
shipping facilities. Again, delays are always possible, but we will do 
our best to ensure we don’t have them.
FAQ’s
Why you are not on Kickstarter?
Because they refused to list my campaign on the grounds that they do not accept
any devices that claim to “cure any disease or illness”. Though, bad posture is
hardly an illness, I decided NOT to deal with those dicks. Let’s show them that
IndieGoGo is better!

How the development is going?
Despite it being a holiday season (BTW, Happy Holidays, Everybody!), we have
been continuously working on SBB. In the video you can see version number 4.
But as of right now, we already are on version number 6. With input of
mechanical engineer from IDP, we have designed 2 more bodies. The objective was
to make it more ergonomic – easier to wear. As the result, they look radically
different from version #4. Specifically, they are rounder and without any
corners or sharp edges. Here are a couple of AutoCAD screenshots: 
Apart from case design, how the development of
other parts is progressing?
Together with IDP electronics engineers, we are working on finding the right
strain gauges to measure the tension. There are thousands of those gauges on the
market! We are trying to identify the one that would work for SBB. After we
identify some, we will test them in the setting similar to SBB. Additionally,
the IDP engineers are trying to identify all other components that would go
inside. For example, just today we’ve had a big discussion on whether or not to
include auto-shut off mechanism that would detect movement or lack thereof and automatically
turn SBB on or off to preserve battery. 

Does it really work? Does it correct posture? Any proof?
Yes, it does. Not only that - it does it better than anything on the market
today. How can I be so sure? Consider this: the SBB is the clavicle support
system (the type of posture-correcting device that pulls your shoulders back) –
there are thousands of those on the market. Search of Amazon and you will see great
number of them. Some are not so good, some are alright (checkout real-world
reviews). Without even talking about the SBB’s “smart” part – it will already
do the function of being a clavicle support – which has proven to be effective.
Now, if we add a “smart” part to already effective device, it becomes ultra-effective!
Not only it will physically help you correct posture, but also will teach your
how to stay proper. Granted, that it may annoy you with warnings about your bad
posture. But it will only do that when you are, indeed, slouching. Of course,
all of the above will only work IF you are actually wearing it! The SBB will
come with usage tracking to help you motivate yourself and show others that you
are trying. Perhaps, you can think of some kind of reward for yourself when you
don’t trigger warnings while wearing it. Motivation is HUGE factor when it
comes to posture correcting.
Is shipping included?Yes.

story:
Hi there, my name is Alina Lapteva.   I was a former professional fashion model.  Now, I am a professional personal trainer, and a nutritionist.  I am also a mother to a beautiful 3 month old baby girl.  Being a mother, doesn't stop me from working out consistently, as well as training my clients.  My passion is to help people in every aspect of their life; make sure their body, mind, and spirit are in harmony.
I started my own company, Your Lifestyle, three years ago.  This is my way of giving back to the community.  One of the charities I did was to feed 150 homeless/low income families home made healthy meals.  We raised awareness for eating healthy, as well as helping people keep a positive mindset.  The experience was very rewarding, and that is something that I would like to continue.  
I also offer workshops and classes to teach people how to exercise correctly using the proper techniques.  
The campaign that I would like to start is called 100 Days After, where we will have participants who would like to achieve their fitness goals, and have an overall healthy transformation within 100 days.  The start of the challenge will be on December 1st, and will end on approximately March 10th.  We will be recording the participants' progress in a reality TV style, providing each with a checklist, and guiding them to maximize their results.  We will then combine the videos, edit them, and turn them into a documentary.  After the 100 days, there will be 3 prizes awarded to the top winners ($1000 for first prize, Healthy day with me, including personal training, fun physical activities, and healthy meals throughout the day for second prize, and lastly, Spa day for third prize).
This campaign is important to me because this is a great opportunity to promote something I truly believe in, which is living a healthy and harmonious lifestyle.  I want to reach and inspire as many people as I possibly can.  Together, with my team, I am hoping to encourage people challenge their limits.  
This whole project will initially be out of my own personal expense, including transportation, facility, prizes, paying the team members for videography, editing, photography, promotional materials, and more.   It will really help me make this whole project happen if I have some support. 
I need about $7,000 ($10K maximum) more in addition to my own personal contributions.  It will go towards the prizes, hourly pay for my team, weekly videography and editing hours, marketing, photoshoot, transportation (we need to rent at least once a week, plus gas), refreshments, commercials.  The project will last about 4 months.  
For every $5 you donate, you will receive a video of me or one of the participants doing 5 jumping jacks dedicated for you (saying your name and thank you). 
For every $10 you donate, we will do 5 push ups dedicated for you (saying your personal message, maximum 10 words. Ex. "Hey, Jen, have an amazing birthday!").
For every $30 you donate, we will do 15 squats, and sing your personal message maximum 10 words (Ex. Oh Jeessiiicaaaaa, you are the loooooove of my liiiiife....from Brian).
For every $100 you donate, you will receive a copy of the 100 Days After Challenge documentary. 
For anything over $100, you will receive a copy of the 100 Days After Challenge documentary, plus a professional group photo signed by the participants. 

The biggest obstacle for this project is to keep all of the participants committed to their goals throughout the entire course of the challenge.

I am a dedicated individual who gets things done, regardless of what setbacks I may face.  I strive to consistently find solutions, and plan things out effectively in an orderly fashion.

Please feel free to share this campaign to others.  We really appreciate your time and help.  Thank you.

story:
Hi There!

I have been training to run a half marathon since September and the time has come to finally do it.

Running has literally saved my life, gotten me through tough times and proved to be more than it seems.  

I am just trying to reach $115.  I do not have the extra money to pay all of it.  

A $1 or $2 would be so appreciated.

It goes to someone who has put in work, has passion, wants results and wants to be better every day, help be a part of that!!

story:
The 2014 Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation Design Challenge: 

Integrating Mental Health Care into local Retail Health Clinics


Visit the Scattergood Foundation's Website to see all 9 Current Submissions to solve this pressing Public Health issue

Each Submission has an equal opportunity to be implemented at QCare Retail Clinic in North Philadelphia, operated by Family Practice and Counseling Network.

 

Take a look at the potential ideas for integration below and make sure to VOTE!

Wellness at Your Fingertips

MH Connect: Real Time Online Behavioral Health Services

Mental Health Recovery Everywhere

Painting Your Portrait of Mental Health

First Choose, Then Meet Your Doctor

Healthy Me

The Core Collaborative Care Platform

QCare iHealthPad: Health/Mental Health Tablet Education & Screening

Hendricks Mind Chart

See "The Gallery" for more information on The Impact retail clinics are having in health care today!

Related News!

  • National Publication, Mental Health Weekly, recently highlighted the Design Challenge. Read more Here!
  • PsychCentral CEO John Grohol, Psy.D., recently promoted our Design Challenge that promotes the integration of mental health care in retail clinics in his World of Psychology Blog. Read it Here!
  • Bustle, a news outlet that "Redefines Women's Interest", spoke highly of our project focused on integrating mental health into retail clinics. Read it Here!
  • Drug Store News has posted an article in support of the Design Challenge. Take a look at it here!

Why You Should Fund this Challenge:

1. QCare, the first retail clinic in North Philadelphia, has agreed to pilot the winner from the Design Challenge - We just need the program!

2. The Scattergood Foundation has agreed to donate $1 for every $1 raised! (up to $2,500)

3. The Design Challenge has proven to create successful and sustainable programs in the past. Read about our previous winners here.

4. This will be the 1st ever comprehensive mental health component in a retail clinic ever! it will forever change the landscape of how health care is delivered at the local level.

If we fail to raise $10,000 - We will still be using the money raised for materials that will help increase Education, Access and Services for mental health care at QCare in North Philadelphia

What is a Design Challenge: 

A Design Challenge can be better understood as asking the community to submit solutions, or interventions, on pressing social issues (in this instance, mental health care)

What is a Retail Clinic?

Retail clinics  (CVS' Minute Clinic, Walgreens' Take Care Clinic) have existed since 2000. They are small health clinics located within a larger store in which patients can receive basic primary health care. They are known for convenience, low cost and high quality care.

To read more on the benefits of Retail Clinics in the health care system today, visit: http://scattergoodfoundation.org/design-challenge - and click "The Impact" pdf on the top right.

Who We Are: 

The Thomas Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation is a Quaker-based, philanthropic, grant-making foundation committed to raising its voice to improve the system through which behavioral healthcare is delivered in the Philadelphia region.

Drexel University School of Public Health provides hands-on opportunities for students and faculty, coupled with the rigor of an incredibly high quality academic environment. Because of our unique community-collaborative approach to education, our graduates leave the Drexel University School of Public Health—founded as a "school without walls"—having already made a meaningful difference in thousands of lives.

The Collaboration between the Scattergood Foundation and Drexel University School of Public Health began in 2011 when Joe Pyle encouraged students of Drexel to work with him on solving pressing mental health issues. Over the past three years the Scattergood Foundation has had three student projects (including this one) that have gone on to present Design Challenges to the community. The past two years have worked with the National Council for Behavioral Health and Active Minds, Inc. to address Mental Health First Aid and Mental Health Stigma on college campuses, respectively. The success of those projects has led Scattergood to present it's first crowdfunded Design Challenge addressing Mental Health in Retail Clinics. This year there are several partnering organizations including: Family Practice and Counseling Network and Mental Health America.


Collaborating Organizations

Drexel University School of Public Health

Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation

 Family Practice and Counseling Network (www.fpcn.com)

 Mental Health America  (www.mentalhealthamerica.net)

 National Register for Health Service Psychologists (www.nationalregister.org)


If your organization would like to collaborate with Scattergood Foundation on this endeavor please contact us at www.scattergoodfoundation.com/design-challenge or e-mail Gregory Caplan at gc429@drexel.edu for more information.


THE TEAM!

 Gregory Caplan, Drexel University School of Public Health Master's Student and Intern with the Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation

 Teresa Moore, Drexel University School of Public Health Master's Student and Intern with the Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation

 Joe Pyle, President, Thomas Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation

 Alyson Ferguson, Special Projects Manager, Thomas Scattergood Behavioral Health Foundation

story:
Short Summary

The details:

  • My name is Kobe and I am a Freshman at Scammon Bay High School in Scammon Bay, Alaska.
  • I am trying to raise $15,000 so I can go and participate in the Cross Country Event for Down Under Sports in Australia.
  • With your help, I can achieve my dream of traveling to Australia to participate in my favorite sport's competition.  I have never traveled farther than Anchorage, and this would allow me the opportunity to see more of the world.


What We Need & What You Get

More info:

  • The trip to Australia costs about $5,000-6,000 each way.
  • Australia is a very expensive country, so I would need money for food, snacks, and entertainment.
  • All money would go towards financing this trip.  Any money not used on the trip would be returned to the donors in even amounts.
  • For every person who donates $100 dollars, they will receive a wristband that says, "Scammon Bay Eagles #1," so that you can support my amazing school and community.

The Impact

How you can change the world:

  • If you donate to this cause, you will have the satisfaction of knowing that you helped fulfill the dream of a Yup'ik native who only this past year traveled as far as Anchorage.  Kobe is keen to see more of the world, and his fresh and eager outlook on the world is captivating.
  • Kobe's life will change for the better when he goes on this trip and experiences a different slice of the world.  This one trip could be the motivator that sends Kobe to college on a full Cross Country Scholarship in the future.  You could be a part of inspiring him to take cross country with him into higher education.
  • If you have any questions, please email his teacher, Max Rotenberry, at mrotenberry@loweryukon.org

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't give money, your help is still valuable!

  • Tell your friends.
  • Tell your family.
  • Tell strangers on the street and on the internet.
  • Spread the word in any way possible!

I am trying to raise $15,000 so I can go and participate in the Cross Country Event for Down Under Sports in Australia.
With your help, I can achieve my dream of traveling to Australia to participate in my favorite sport's competition.  I have never traveled farther than Anchorage, and this would allow me the opportunity to see more of the world.
What We Need & What You GetMore info:
The trip to Australia costs about $5,000-6,000 each way.
Australia is a very expensive country, so I would need money for food, snacks, and entertainment.
All money would go towards financing this trip.  Any money not used on the trip would be returned to the donors in even amounts.
For every person who donates $100 dollars, they will receive a wristband that says, "Scammon Bay Eagles #1," so that you can support my amazing school and community.
The ImpactHow you can change the world:
If you donate to this cause, you will have the satisfaction of knowing that you helped fulfill the dream of a Yup'ik native who only this past year traveled as far as Anchorage.  Kobe is keen to see more of the world, and his fresh and eager outlook on the world is captivating.
Kobe's life will change for the better when he goes on this trip and experiences a different slice of the world.  This one trip could be the motivator that sends Kobe to college on a full Cross Country Scholarship in the future.  You could be a part of inspiring him to take cross country with him into higher education.
If you have any questions, please email his teacher, Max Rotenberry, at mrotenberry@loweryukon.org
Other Ways You Can HelpEven if you can't give money, your help is still valuable!
Tell your friends.
Tell your family.
Tell strangers on the street and on the internet.
Spread the word in any way possible!

story:
CIREN SMART ALARM

OUR MISSION IS YOUR SAFETY!

BUILD THE 1st WORLDWIDE NETWORK FOR RESCUE, HELP, PROTECTION AND SAFETY WITH CIREN and the CIREN APP !

Safety and help in critical situations is important for almost everyone but especially women, kids and older people. The idea for CIREN was born in several situations of friends or colleagues were help or support was needed. We had the idea to offer a kind of alarm connected with some helpful functions.

CIREN was invented to combine handsome design and wearable technology with the social networked and mobile applications.

The first prototype has proven that CIREN can realize the vision of a smart alarm device with huge range of functionality. The money will be used for developing CIREN to serial production, to finalize the software and iOS and Android app and to step into the market. We will settle the company in USA and Germany in parallel. Our team in CA is focusing on SW development the team in Germany on hardware and design. Our company is currently registered in UK, were we can make us of high skilled developers for commercial products in cooperating company nearby.


ALARM – FLASH – ALERT  and more….

Prevent against violence, attacks…

CIREN is your small and smart assistant which can by a very useful help if you are getting in troubles or if you are getting attacked.  

Help in critical situations!

The CIREN Rescue and Alarm Wearable and Network Solution is a brand-new invention – strongly driven by the needs women, teenager and kids but also for men in any age.

CIREN – the smart private alarm


  • Imagine – you are just leaving a concert, walking to your car.
  • Imagine – you are walking alone in a dark street.
  • Imagine – your child is out with a group of other teens.
  • Imagine – you forget you smart phone
  • Imagine –  … so many more situation when CIREN can make the help easier and safer!

Developed based on real life experience



“I have invented the CIREN smart private alarm based on experiences in real life. I am a black belt full contact Karate Trainer and I am teaching women and children in self-defence. During me courses we are discussing records and experience of the daily live and I recognized: in more than 50% of the situation a smart alarm system could have been a perfect prevention or help.”

The CIREN (the name comes from “Cyber” and “Siren”) was invented as a very smart, easy to use system which can be used for a couple of other very nice functions. But during in our development with some UK partners, we also faced some complexity in getting it smart and reliable. We had to develop some new algorithms and we had to find a good concept of getting a hardware with all this functionalities into a handsome nice and small design!

But we succeed! The first prototypes proofed the concept and all my friends and business partners are very excited and the pushed us to get to the next step: the development to the serial product and to sell it to the market.

To go with the market and to hit the needs of the market, we decided to use a modern funding concept and we hope that all of you support the idea of the product!

Helps to protect against

  • Robbery
  • Rape
  • Violent attacks
  • or any other kind of dangerous situation.

Helps in following Situations

  • If help is needed (e.g. for elder people or children)
  • If you going to forget something or your smart phone

ALARM and RESCUE Function

If you are in troubles or if you need any kind of urgent help, you can switch on Ciren
in different modes and in different level with one hand. Depending on the profile and mode following functions are available:

Loud and attention-grabbing Sound

Flashing Lights

Communicate with you Smart – Phone to start following options

  • Inform your Social Network instantly
  • Send your location
  • Starting live recording
  • Starting video streaming
  • Inform the CIREN Alarm Central
  • Activate the CIREN of your friends

Theft Warning Function

In the warning mode,  CIREN is reminding you when loosing contact to your smartphone or any object it is attached to.

If you want to secure your personal thinks, you only have to select the “the theft warning function” in the CIREN App and attach it to your personal belonging. As soon as your distance to the object is more than 10m the alarm starts to remind or inform you. The object can be traced with the smart phone during the battery lifetime of CIREN (appr. 12h).

Kids Care Function

CIREN can do more! If you want to provide your children more safety, CIREN will deliver an important part. In this functional mode, CIREN uses its integrated GPS (in the optional version) and a combination of standard functions to enable a tracking of your child if it gets in troubles. The functions can be used on both sides: either so send a help request if your Child has no chance to call you by phone, or you can trace a location and you will get warned if you Child is leaving this area.

Senior Care Function

Older people are suffering from limited mobility and might get in problems in their home or if they are outside. Besides having a own smart phone, CIREN can be an additional help which can be worn like a hanger around the neck. Using the entire bidirectional communication with the smartphone, following functionalities can be part of the senior care:

  • Emergency signal (alarm sound and notification
  • Reminder for medicine (sound and vibration)
  • One touch call to defined numbers

Easy to operate


CIREN can be operated completely with one hand. The main functions like alarm are accessible with the central turning knob (it is also flashing). To smaller knobs activating secondary functions (loudness etc.).  And all functions can be controlled also with your smart phone using the CIREN app.

Easy connection to you social Network

CIREN can be connected via  the CIREN App suite to you suite to your social networks like:

  • Facebook
  • Whatsapp
  • WeChat
  • Etc.

You can add your friends, relatives or any other trusted person to alarm lists, information list or giving them the right to track your position in emergency situations.

The TEAM

Our international team works closely connected via internet with a global footprint, everything managed under the company framework of TKI ltd. in UK.

  • Germany: hardware development
  • UK and Romania: Software development
  • USA: design and marketing
  • China: marketing


Croud-Funds for an Investment in Personal Security

Usage of the Funds

The funding of the project will be used for the 3 next stages of our project: development to a serial product, application development and marketing. Based in UK we have access to all kinds engineering and development facilities including a very strong software development team. Our company staff will focus on business and market development as well as on customer relation management – and off course on the ongoing development of the CIREN product and functionality.

Development to a Serial Product

The CIREN Product is in a prototype stage which shows the feasibility of the functionality. The core components are ready to be transfers to large volume serial products and an automated assembly line is ready designed. One major part of the development cost goes into a final product design to decide for the right long lasting material with a good optical quality and haptic. Another major part goes into quality and reliability testing to ensure a proper function of over lifetime.

Application development

The mobile application is the second heart of CIREN. The big range of different functionalities are all supported and controlled by the mobile app. To integrate hardware functionalities with a huge range onalities and the integration to social network, we have designed a CIREN App Suite for a n easy access to to different main types of functions.


The development of the application is done by our dedicated software team at a preferred software house with years of experience in mobile applications and wearable solutions. A professional quality assurance ensures a perfect functionality and reliability of CIREN.

Sales and Marketing

We are focusing on getting CIREN into a fast market entry. This needs a multilevel marketing mainly based on three pillars: network marketing in social networks, advertisement in video and tube sites, and other media and as third pillar direct marketing via sales channels.

As distribution and sales channels we have decided to use online shops but also local shops and shop chains and finally gyms, PTs and dedicated organizations.

Testemonials

“When I heard first time about CIREN, was immediately sure that such a product could be very useful. But when I saw the prototype I got completely excited”.  Nicole H.

“We were approached by the idea of sellingCIREN in our online-stores. And after an explanation of the functionality and the presentation of a first prototype, we agreed to step in to a test phase for selling once the first series is available”. Johann B.
story_txt:
CIREN SMART ALARM
OUR MISSION IS YOUR SAFETY!BUILD THE 1st WORLDWIDE NETWORK FOR RESCUE, HELP, PROTECTION AND SAFETY WITH CIREN and the CIREN APP !

Safety and help in critical situations is important for almost everyone but especially women, kids  and older people. The idea for CIREN was born in several situations of friends or colleagues were help or support was needed.  We had the idea to offer a kind of alarm connected with some helpful functions.
CIREN was invented to combine handsome design and wearable technology with the social networked and mobile applications.

The first prototype has proven that CIREN can realize the vision of a smart alarm device with huge range of functionality. The money will be used for developing CIREN to serial production, to finalize the software and iOS and Android app and to step into the market. We will settle the company in USA and Germany in parallel. Our team in CA is focusing on SW development the team in Germany on hardware and design. Our company is currently registered in UK, were we can make us of high skilled developers for commercial products in cooperating company nearby.


ALARM – FLASH – ALERT  and more….
Prevent against violence, attacks…
CIREN is your small and smart assistant which
can by a very useful help if you are getting in troubles or if you are getting
attacked.  


Help in critical situations!
The CIREN Rescue and Alarm Wearable and
Network Solution is a brand-new invention – strongly driven by the needs women,
teenager and kids but also for men in any age.
CIREN – the smart private alarm 







Imagine – you are just leaving a concert,
walking to your car.


Imagine – you are walking alone in a dark street.


Imagine – your child is out with a group of other teens.


Imagine – you forget you smart phone


Imagine –  … so many more situation when
CIREN can make the help easier and safer!


Developed based on real life experience




“I have invented the CIREN smart private
alarm based on experiences in real life. I am a black belt full contact Karate
Trainer and I am teaching women and children in self-defence. During me courses
we are discussing records and experience of the daily live and I recognized: in
more than 50% of the situation a smart alarm system could have been a perfect
prevention or help.”
The CIREN (the name comes from “Cyber” and
“Siren”) was invented as a very smart, easy to use system which can be used for
a couple of other very nice functions. But during in our development with some
UK partners, we also faced some complexity in getting it smart and reliable. We
had to develop some new algorithms and we had to find a good concept of getting
a hardware with all this functionalities into a handsome nice and small design!
But we succeed! The first prototypes
proofed the concept and all my friends and business partners are very excited
and the pushed us to get to the next step: the development to the serial
product and to sell it to the market. 
To go with the market and to hit the needs
of the market, we decided to use a modern funding concept and we hope that all
of you support the idea of the product!
Helps to protect against



Robbery


Rape


Violent attacks


or any other kind of dangerous
situation.


Helps in following Situations



If help is needed (e.g. for
elder people or children)


If you going to forget
something or your smart phone


ALARM and RESCUE Function
If you are in troubles or if you need any
kind of urgent help, you can switch on Cirenin different modes and in
different level with one hand. Depending on the profile and mode following functions
are available:
Loud and attention-grabbing Sound 
Flashing Lights
Communicate with you Smart – Phone to start
following options



Inform your Social Network
instantly


Send your location


Starting live recording


Starting video streaming


Inform the CIREN Alarm Central


Activate the CIREN of your
friends


Theft Warning Function
In the warning mode,  CIREN is reminding you when loosing contact to
your smartphone or any object it is attached to. 
If you want to secure your personal thinks,
you only have to select the “the theft warning function” in the CIREN App and
attach it to your personal belonging. As soon as your distance to the object is
more than 10m the alarm starts to remind or inform you. The object can be
traced with the smart phone during the battery lifetime of CIREN (appr. 12h). 
Kids Care Function
CIREN can do more! If you want to provide
your children more safety, CIREN will deliver an important part. In this
functional mode, CIREN uses its integrated GPS (in the optional version) and a
combination of standard functions to enable a tracking of your child if it gets
in troubles. The functions can be used on both sides: either so send a help
request if your Child has no chance to call you by phone, or you can trace a
location and you will get warned if you Child is leaving this area.
Senior Care Function
Older people are suffering from limited
mobility and might get in problems in their home or if they are outside.
Besides having a own smart phone, CIREN can be an additional help which can be
worn like a hanger around the neck. Using the entire bidirectional
communication with the smartphone, following functionalities can be part of the
senior care:



Emergency signal (alarm sound
and notification


Reminder for medicine (sound
and vibration)


One touch call to defined
numbers




Easy to operate



CIREN can be operated completely with one hand. The main functions like alarm are accessible with the central turning knob (it is also flashing). To smaller knobs activating secondary functions (loudness etc.).  And all functions can be controlled also with your smart phone using the CIREN app.

Easy connection to you social Network
CIREN can be connected via  the CIREN App
suite to you suite to your social networks like:



Facebook


Whatsapp


WeChat


Etc.


You can add your friends, relatives or any
other trusted person to alarm lists, information list or giving them the right
to track your position in emergency situations.

The TEAM
Our international team works closely connected via internet with a global footprint, everything managed under the company framework of TKI ltd. in UK.


Germany: hardware development


UK and Romania: Software development


USA: design and marketing


China: marketing



Croud-Funds for an Investment in Personal Security
Usage of the Funds 
The funding of the project will be used for
the 3 next stages of our project: development to a serial product, application
development and marketing. Based in UK we have access to all kinds engineering
and development facilities including a very strong software development team.
Our company staff will focus on business and market development as well as on
customer relation management – and off course on the ongoing development of the
CIREN product and functionality.
Development to a Serial Product
The CIREN Product is in a prototype stage
which shows the feasibility of the functionality. The core components are ready
to be transfers to large volume serial products and an automated assembly line
is ready designed. One major part of the development cost goes into a final
product design to decide for the right long lasting material with a good
optical quality and haptic. Another major part goes into quality and
reliability testing to ensure a proper function of over lifetime.
Application development
The mobile application is the second heart of
CIREN. The big range of different functionalities are all supported and
controlled by the mobile app. To integrate hardware functionalities with a huge
range onalities and the integration to social network, we have
designed a CIREN App Suite for a n easy access to to different main types of
functions.

The development of the application is done
by our dedicated software team at a preferred software house with years of
experience in mobile applications and wearable solutions. A professional
quality assurance ensures a perfect functionality and reliability of CIREN.
Sales and Marketing
We are focusing on getting CIREN into a fast market entry. This needs a
multilevel marketing mainly based on three pillars: network marketing in social
networks, advertisement in video and tube sites, and other media and as third
pillar direct marketing via sales channels.
As distribution and sales channels we have
decided to use online shops but also local shops and shop chains and finally
gyms, PTs and dedicated organizations.
Testemonials
“When I heard first time about CIREN, was immediately
sure that such a product could be very useful. But when I saw the prototype I
got completely excited”.  Nicole H.
“We were approached by the idea of sellingCIREN in our online-stores. And after an explanation of the functionality and
the presentation of a first prototype, we agreed to step in to a test phase for
selling once the first series is available”. Johann B.

story:
My name is Mason Young. I'm 17 and a member of the Boy Scouts. In order to achieve the highest honor in the organization, The Eagle Rank, I will complete an Eagle Project. In this project I give back to the community in some way. I will build a volleyball court for the kids at a local summer environmental camp. When I was much younger this camp was the highlight of my summer. I made some very good friends there that are close even to this day. I liked it so much i came back as a teen to become a camp counselor. It's an amazing place where kids of all ages can be outside and both enjoy and learn about nature. Once a year Walmart funds a camp there for terminally ill children to get a chance to experience nature. Most of the elementary schools in Shasta County have a program over the winter where they take a group of students up there for a week to learn about nature and the environment as a supplement to their education. This camp will even provide a discount for children in need so they may come to the summer camp almost free of charge.

But their volleyball court is overgrown and run down. As you can see in the photo it's mostly weeds and the dirt has hardened to the point where it's almost rock. Their net is ragged and the poles are mere tires with metal rods in them.

My plan is to excavate about 4-6 inches into the ground and lay down some weed cloth to keep the weeds away. Then I will fill it back up with plaster sand to create a nice surface for playing on. Also, a commercial grade set of all weather poles and nets will be installed. These poles will go in sheaths in the ground so they can be removed easily during the winter cold moths.

I'm raising the 850 dollars for the set of poles and nets. This will cost about 730 dollars. The remainder of the balance will be spent on the weed cloth and cement for the pole sheaths, to prevent them from being easily taken.

This court will greatly improve the experience of the children at this camp. They did so much for me, so now I want to give back to them. Please help if you can.

story:
Survivor may herald an entirely new approach to alcohol consumption - a revolutionary nutritional supplement formulation designed specifically to be taken when consuming alcohol. Survivor aims to restore productivity the day after drinking with a long term goal to mitigate some of the longer term harmful effects of alcohol consumption.

Survivor was founded by Rocket Internet alumni Laurence Cardwell and marketing professional Richard Tidman. The science behind Survivor originates from the mind of Prof. Dr. Gertrude Kubiena, ex Vice President of the Red Cross, with a formulation developed by food scientist Simon Williams, director of one of Europes leading nutraceutical suppliers. We count a number of medical, pharmaceutical and nutritional experts amongst our senior advisor team.

Survivor may have the capacity to go beyond just being a capsule to chase down your G&T and actually help offset some of the harm associated with alcohol consumption - and we need the data to show this to the world.


 


Alcohol - a great friend and unforgiving enemy. Its invention has been tied to the beginning of civilisation by some historians, and Western culture is undeniably tied to it. And everyone knows the devastating slap of the ‘hangover’, which has been glorified as a cultural phenomenon in itself.

However there is more to an alcohol-induced ‘hangover’ beyond mere discomfort, lying about like a limp noodle or drooling uselessly at your desk, blasting fumes of booze at your unconsenting and unamused colleagues.

Some concerning statistics put things into perspective: the average Brit loses a shocking 24 days of productivity per year, due to the effects of alcohol consumption. That equates to over 4 years in the average lifespan.

 

This negative effect on productivity can be difficult to accept in a world where social and professional lives often collide.

However, even beyond loss of productivity, there’s a far larger spectre looming: alcohol’s consequences on health. And not only when binge drinking. Say goodbye to the idea that a glass of wine is ‘healthy’ for you, and hello to the ultimate killjoy - the Global Burden of Disease Study of 2016. This meta study assessed alcohol-related health outcomes between 1990-2016 across 195 countries.

Their conclusion: no amount of alcohol is safe.

Which is why we created Survivor.



 


Survivor is not a hangover cure, it is a nutritional supplement designed to reduce the likelihood of one occurring, as well as offering greater protection to health for those that choose to consume alcohol.

Survivor features a high quality potent blend of traditional herbal extracts in combination with a bespoke blend of vitamins, minerals, electrolytes and nutrients which contribute to normal cognitive function, reduction in tiredness and fatigue, normal functioning of the nervous system, protection of cells from oxidative stress, normal energy yielding metabolism and normal psychological function.

Survivor is designed to be taken both whilst you drink, and before you go to sleep - helping replace the nutrients lost as a side effect to drinking alcohol, and to deliver those all important ingredients at the point they are able to make the greatest impact.

Given alcohol could never be made healthier, Survivor’s end goal is to make drinking less unhealthy. Our product is designed to be used as a complementary tool to a responsible approach to alcohol consumption.
 

 



Our formulation is designed to be consumed when drinking alcohol and contains a blend of nutrients focussed on supporting a number of hepatic, cognitive and metabolic functions which can be affected or impaired through elevated blood alcohol levels.
 

 

While dehydration, fatigue, glucose imbalances, gastrointestinal acidity, and so forth contribute to ‘hangovers’, the main criminal is alcohol’s first metabolite, the inflammatory toxin acetaldehyde which is over 40x more toxic than alcohol itself. Its crimes: headaches, facial flushing, nausea, vomiting, increased heart rate and increased blood pressure.

This is where Survivor’s high concentrations of truly revolutionary ingredients stand out: Dihydromyricetin and Puerariae lobatae Flos. Used for thousands of years in traditional medicine as hangover treatments, they are now coming to the attention of Western medicine for their ability to accelerate the breakdown of acetaldehyde, mitigating its significant inflammatory impact.
 


 


In addition to these two fascinating ingredients, Survivor contains a complementary blend of additional nutrients focussed on supporting your body in its response to alcohol consumption.

We've included ingredients with a view to improving your quality of sleep, protecting against oxidative stress - which leads to inflammation in the body, helping your body maintain normal cognitive function and normal energy yielding metabolism - as well as replenishing your reserves of various vitamins, some of which can be depleted when consuming alcohol.

 



Our greater mission however, is to seek ways to mitigate the negative impact alcohol has on the body. This is why Prof. Dr. Kubiena, a former Vice-President of the Red Cross, stated that “…the potential long-term health consequences of Survivor could be enormous,” envisioning Survivor as something to top off every drinking occasion, from the high tempo night on the town, to those two civilised glasses of wine over dinner.

And this is why Business Insider wrote that “Survivor may herald an entirely new approach to more responsible alcohol consumption,” effectively “short-circuiting some of the damage caused by alcohol as part of a holistic long-term approach to health.”

 







 

 


 

Laurence Cardwell, Co-founder and CEO

An Englishman born in Austria and raised in Costa Rica, Laurence graduated from St Andrews University, Scotland, with a First in History and Management, also spending time in the British Army and featuring in assorted television programmes, for instance as a cowboy in BBC3’s ‘World’s Toughest Jobs’ and briefly on a BBC2 reality show on Victorian slums. His professional life is equally colourful: Laurence worked at the International Chamber of Commerce, co-founded a luxury real estate brand in Spain, worked at the Vatican, taught Critical Thinking at Dulwich College, launched a crêperie, and finally worked with the operational venture capital fund and startup incubator, Rocket Internet, as a business development manager.

 

Richard Tidman, Co-founder and Chief Marketing & Technology Officer

Richard brings a wealth of strategic and operational marketing experience to Survivor, having spent two decades working with global brands such as Nestlé, Pfizer and Skype. Richard has spent time in house with PWC, led digital marketing for equity crowdfunding company VentureFounders and has advised a number of startups on marketing operations and technical innovation.

 

Prof. Dr. med. et Mag. phil. Gertrude Kubiena, Ex-Red Cross Vice President

Across a fascinating career which saw her as a high-ranking politician, Prof. Dr. Kubiena was a former Vice President of the Red Cross, author of 20+ books, Austrian Civic Cross recipient, and now a Director at Survivor - through her experience as the foremost authority for Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) in Austria, she placed DHM and the Pueraria flower at the core of Survivor’s formulation.

“Dihydromyricetin alongside Pueraria lobata flos have individually been powerful ingredients in Traditional Chinese Medicine as hangover treatments. Now they are coming to the attention of Western medicine.

“Extracted to great purity and combined in Survivor, this fascinating combination targets the mechanisms which break down the inflammatory toxin acetaldehyde, alcohol's first metabolite.

“Given one stream of medical thought holds that chronic inflammation is behind the major degenerative diseases that plague the West, speculatively, the potential long-term health consequences of Survivor could be enormous.”

- Prof. Dr. med et Mag. phil. Gertrude Kubiena, as cited in Business Insider

 


Simon Williams, Food Scientist and Director, Nutraceuticals Group Europe

Simon is a director of one of Europe’s largest nutraceutical suppliers and has well as over twenty years’ formulation expertise as a food and nutritional scientist. While Prof. Dr. Kubiena provided Survivor with its three key ingredients, Simon Williams used his scientific formulation experience and leveraged his position in Nutraceuticals Group Europe to guide the full formulation of Survivor, source the highest-quality ingredients, and combine them using the latest formulation technology.

"I’ve worked closely with the team at Survivor to develop the formulation we see in the product today. Building on the two core botanicals as directed by Prof. Dr. Kubiena, we extended the formulation to include a range of complementary nutrients to further reinforce the efficacy of Survivor. 

Using our extensive network in the field, we sourced and developed a custom blend comprising the highest quality ingredients and established a fully audited and certified supply chain backed by quality benchmarking by two laboratories in the UK and Germany.

With our in-house team of food scientists, nutritionists, and biochemists, alongside our assay testing equipment, we not only guarantee the highest standard of ingredients, we are continually developing the formulation to optimise concentration and bioavailability."


Dr. Axel Polack, General Partner, Joint Polish Investment Fund, Biomedical Research

With a background in molecular and translational medicine, Dr Polack has followed a three-phase career path, with notable achievements in venture capital specialising in the life sciences, alongside business management, and biomedical research. He is currently General Partner at the Joint Polish Investment Fund, a life-science oriented early-stage venture capital fund. His broad experience in the pharmaceutical drug development process, coupled with strategic and operational management of businesses are crucial to Survivor as we seek to formalise our scientific credentials, cement our proprietary intellectual property, and navigate a complex regulatory environment.

“Survivor piqued my interest from two perspectives - firstly from an academic curiosity given my background in biomedical research and the pharmaceutical industry, and secondly from the venture capital angle, given the enormous market potential an effective product such as Survivor could fulfil.”

 


Prior to the launch of our Indiegogo campaign, we've been working hard to get the foundations in place for a successful launch. 

We already have our UK based ingredients and manufacturing partners in place - along with an innovative and award winning packaging format. We have a scalable and quality-assured supply chain, an outsourced warehousing and fulfilment partner and delivery solutions lined up - enabling us to get product into our customers hands quickly and cost effectively.

We've also run a successful product sampling campaign which saw over 4,000 people have the chance to try Survivor for themselves, with some incredibly positive feedback and testimonials received.


We have two main objectives for the remainder of 2019, and support from the Indiegogo community will help us on the way to achieving these goals:

  • Firstly, to invest in a research study aimed at further demonstrating the safety and efficacy of our product in a controlled environment. It's not a requirement for a nutritional supplement to undergo such rigorous testing - we have made the decision as a company to pursue this route in order to provide greater confidence to our customers in the effectiveness of our formulation, and to demonstrate the responsibility we feel given the sensitive nature of the category in which we market ourselves. Alcohol health is not a subject or endeavour to be taken lightly, and we fully recognise the weight of responsibility we have to get this right. Depending upon the amount we raise, this study will increase in size and scope - however we require a minimum of £10,000 to fund a base level study which we will be able to achieve when we reach our minimum fundraising target of £20,000.
     
  • Secondly, in order to bring Survivor to a wider audience, we plan to invest in marketing and distribution for our product. We have an e-Commerce website ready for launch on completion of this campaign, however in order to gain greater exposure for our mission and Survivor as a product, we plan to undertake marketing activity which will bring Survivor to an increasingly larger audience - subject to the amount we raise. This activity ranges from small scale product sampling in key cities, through to attendance at music and entertainments events. We have various marketing plans defined which we will be able to action, subject to the amount we raise. 



Whilst our perks begin at £12, you can make a donation to our campaign for any value you choose - we'd really appreciate the support however much you choose to pledge.

We'd also love you help in getting the word out about Survivor. Please share our campaign via the social media sharing buttons on this page. Spreading the word about our campaign and our product will greatly help us in our mission to reduce the harmful effects of alcohol consumption.

Using our extensive network in the field, we sourced and developed a custom blend comprising the highest quality ingredients and established a fully audited and certified supply chain backed by quality benchmarking by two laboratories in the UK and Germany.
With our in-house team of food scientists, nutritionists, and biochemists, alongside our assay testing equipment, we not only guarantee the highest standard of ingredients, we are continually developing the formulation to optimise concentration and bioavailability."

Dr. Axel Polack, General Partner, Joint Polish Investment Fund, Biomedical Research
With a background in molecular and translational medicine, Dr Polack has followed a three-phase career path, with notable achievements in venture capital specialising in the life sciences, alongside business management, and biomedical research. He is currently General Partner at the Joint Polish Investment Fund, a life-science oriented early-stage venture capital fund. His broad experience in the pharmaceutical drug development process, coupled with strategic and operational management of businesses are crucial to Survivor as we seek to formalise our scientific credentials, cement our proprietary intellectual property, and navigate a complex regulatory environment.
“Survivor piqued my interest from two perspectives - firstly from an academic curiosity given my background in biomedical research and the pharmaceutical industry, and secondly from the venture capital angle, given the enormous market potential an effective product such as Survivor could fulfil.”
 

Prior to the launch of our Indiegogo campaign, we've been working hard to get the foundations in place for a successful launch. 
We already have our UK based ingredients and manufacturing partners in place - along with an innovative and award winning packaging format. We have a scalable and quality-assured supply chain, an outsourced warehousing and fulfilment partner and delivery solutions lined up - enabling us to get product into our customers hands quickly and cost effectively.
We've also run a successful product sampling campaign which saw over 4,000 people have the chance to try Survivor for themselves, with some incredibly positive feedback and testimonials received.
We have two main objectives for the remainder of 2019, and support from the Indiegogo community will help us on the way to achieving these goals:


Firstly, to invest in a research study aimed at further demonstrating the safety and efficacy of our product in a controlled environment. It's not a requirement for a nutritional supplement to undergo such rigorous testing - we have made the decision as a company to pursue this route in order to provide greater confidence to our customers in the effectiveness of our formulation, and to demonstrate the responsibility we feel given the sensitive nature of the category in which we market ourselves. Alcohol health is not a subject or endeavour to be taken lightly, and we fully recognise the weight of responsibility we have to get this right. Depending upon the amount we raise, this study will increase in size and scope - however we require a minimum of £10,000 to fund a base level study which we will be able to achieve when we reach our minimum fundraising target of £20,000. 

Secondly, in order to bring Survivor to a wider audience, we plan to invest in marketing and distribution for our product. We have an e-Commerce website ready for launch on completion of this campaign, however in order to gain greater exposure for our mission and Survivor as a product, we plan to undertake marketing activity which will bring Survivor to an increasingly larger audience - subject to the amount we raise. This activity ranges from small scale product sampling in key cities, through to attendance at music and entertainments events. We have various marketing plans defined which we will be able to action, subject to the amount we raise. 





Whilst our perks begin at £12, you can make a donation to our campaign for any value you choose - we'd really appreciate the support however much you choose to pledge.We'd also love you help in getting the word out about Survivor. Please share our campaign via the social media sharing buttons on this page. Spreading the word about our campaign and our product will greatly help us in our mission to reduce the harmful effects of alcohol consumption.

story: **************************************** SEE SURGERY UPDATE AT BOTTOM *************************************** I am a 48 yr old hearing impaired Mom of 3 children and 4 grandchildren. I was diagnosed with Cancer cells and a Lump and have had biopsy surgeries, plus lots of tests. Due to most recent tests my breast surgery has been moved up to 2/13/2012 I have always been healthy and began feeling sick about 4 months ago. I got the basic insurance at work when I qualified after 6 months because that is all I could afford, but unfortunatley it has a $7500 deductible and due to being out of work for a couple years before finding my most recent job, I now have no savings left and make just above minimum wage. I do not have any back up insurance such as aflac or anything to cover loss of work, I have only been on my job 8 months. I have already lost 3 weeks of work without pay due to recent surgeries. I have had to move in with family to be able to have a roof over my head. I really need help with raising monies to help me with my medical bills and loss of work. Since I do not qualify for state help because I am a single woman with no minor children. Please Please I hope you will find it in your heart to help me. I don't even know what to say on here. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *********************************** SURGERY UPDATE 02/14/2012 ************************************************************************************************************************* I am home from hospital after breast  surgery, still pretty groggy, the drs had to take more than thought but did get it all!! YAY, dr wants me off work 2-3 wks depending on how I am progressing and then we will proceed to the next steps ... FUNNY STORY: They were waking me after surgery in recovery & kept saying my name, I said wait... a minute I'm on the phone, then opened my eyes, and said where am I ? I thought I was at work on the phone. LOL... nurses thought it was funny. Since every few minutes I kept asking where I was, yep gotta love general anesthesia..LOL ....Love you all! â™¥ â™¥ THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR EVERYTHING!!! â™¥ â™¥

story:
A word from Calista:

Hey everybody! I am Calista Moore and I am a 12 year old 7th grader in Jesup, Georgia.  I play the sax in the middle school band, am an honor student and a member of the Jr. Beta Club, play basketball and LOVE karate!

I have been competing on Corky Sikes Team Strike Force for the past 2 years.  I love karate and competing.  I spend hours everyday practicing so that I can beat the best in the world to BE the best.  My favorite part of karate is weapons. And my weapon of choice... my nunchucks! If you watched my video, then you saw the trick I posted.  I learned that trick just a week before that video was taken!

Karate has helped me become more disciplined in everything I do and it has helped me learn the values of hard work and respect.  It's more than a sport, it's my lifestyle.

With the wins that I have from this past season and with YOUR donations I hope to be able to compete in one of the biggest sport karate tournamemts in the world...World Super Grands in Buffalo, New York in December!  I work to help pay for the costs of my tournements but this one is the furthest away and the most expensive on the circuit and I really need your help to get me there!

Thanks,

Calista

 

The details:

Sport karate, as with most every competive sport, is pretty expensive. However, this tournamnet is the most expensive tournament of the year.  We are goaling for $2000 in funds, which is about half of our estimated costs for 3 of us ( Calista, myself and her little sister) will need to attend, to help us get Calista to this world competition.

 The World Super Grands will be from December 26th through December 31st. Between travel (airefare for 3), hotel (7 nights), food and most importantly tournament registration these costs add up very quickly 

Your donations will not only help Calista compete on a world stage against the BEST athletes in sport karate but it will also help to promote the benefits of karate for kids.  We all need something to be passionate about...Calista is passionate about karate.  It feeds into every aspect of her life.  The positive benefits have been more than I could have ever imagined.  Help us get her to her dream of competing at World Super Grands!

Thanks for your consideration and donations! If you can not donate, PLEASE at least post this link/video on your facebook/twitter pages to help us spread the campaign!

Thank you and God Bless!

Carrie Hires(Calista's mom)

story:
Short Summary

Greetings.

Thank you for taking interest in my project.

My name is Morgana, and I want to make and distribute homemade tea with creative themes. I am from California and I have always enjoyed tea and the thought of creating my own.

I hope to soon operate March Hare Tea - a home-based organization consisting of myself and an artist. My hope is to create teas that are...well, creative.

I intend to use any funding towards purchasing supplies and paying the proper fees so that I may create and distribute my products legally. I plan on  distributing online and at events.

Any and all contributions will help--even if you don't donate, spreading my project by word of mouth is greatly appreciated. It is my goal to get enough funding to get my project off the ground, and if I don't, I'll still push towards my goal.

What We Need & What You Get

$550 for tea? I'm not joking. The tea won't be that much, of course, but getting the tools, documents, health inspections, and supplies will actually take more than $550. However, I don't want to ask for too much.

In order to make the tea, I have to first get the proper supplies to blend it. Your funding helps me get these items. This includes but is not limited to:

Legal Documentation -

  • Seller's Permit
  • Resale Permit
  • Registration with County Health Department
  • Health Department Permit
  • Fee for annual health inspection
  • Food handler classes and card
  • Royalty fees for artist

Preparation Supplies -

  • Sanitation supplies
  • Food handling supplies
  • Food preparation supplies 
  • Mortar and Pestel

Tea Bag Supplies -

  • Sewing Machine
  • Coffe Filters
  • Thread
  • Glossy Paper (for tags)
  • Press-N-Brew Teabags

Packaging Supplies - 

  • Tea Tins
  • Label art
  • quality printer paper
  • cardstock
  • and ink

Tea itself - (about $20 per pound)

  • Organic Tea Components
  • Organic Herbal Components

 

Our first tea line will be called Mythic Delectation. Each tea will be an organic blend that follows the theme of a creature from myth or fantasy. The tea will come in handmade bags with paper tags bearing the character on them. There will be fifty bags per tin, and the tin will be covered in decorative art, mythological facts, and nutrition details. Every character will be featured in art nouveau style. Also, each character will have a collectible card that can be used in a simple yet enjoyable game with friends.

The Mythic Delectation teas will feature many cultures and myths like the Irish Selkies, Egyptian and Greek Sphinx, Chinese Dragon, and the Japanese Waving Cat. Fantasy creatures like Drow, Alicorns, and Phoenix will also be included

Perks include items from our first tea line, Mythic Delectation. Depending on what you contribute, you can recieve the following:

  • A character card featuring one of the tea line's characters. 
  • Your choice of a box of tea as well as a character card signed by the creators. 
  • A sampler box of the different tea blends.
  • A set of character cards, signed by the creators. 
  • An art book, signed by the creators. 
  • A tea cup and saucer set featuring the company logo.

 

Even if I do not reach my entire goal, funds will still go directly to The March Hare Tea project. I will continue to work on creating the teas.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money, you can still help out. 

Spread the Word

  • Add us on Facebook
  • Tell your friends
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools
  • Visit our website
  • Contact us by email: morgana@marchharetea.com

 

 

Thank you so much for your interest and time.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

 

MH

story:
Hello,

I am writing this for my friend Nicole. I watched her get married 4 years ago and was there for the birth of her daughter just 1 and 1/2 years ago. She is 32 and was diagnosed with an aggressive form of IIB breast cancer in the middle of October 2011. On Halloween she had a double radical mastectomy and had to have 42 lymphnodes removed. The doctors told her that this would just be the beginning of many obstacles. She had no clue that shortly after she started her chemotherapy treatments her husband would decide that he did not love her anymore and chose to leave her. In the midst of the worst time in her life she had to move out of thier home of 6 years and try to make it through everything alone. She had to do 4 months of harsh chemo followed by 6 weeks of radiation therapy. During this time I saw how devestated and sick she was. Though, she is done with her treatments she still needs to have 2 surgeries. She needs her breast reconstrustion and will need a hysterectomy since she is positive for the breast cancer gene.

I am trying to raise this money for Nicole and her daughter because I have been there and watched her struggle to make ends meet. She is one of the most caring people I know and has always been there for me. Nicole has had a lot of medical bills and there are still many more to come. She is trying to get her life back in order after losing her boobs, her husband, her home, her dog and her hair. She has been very courageous through all of this and I just want to bring some happiness back into her life and help her pay some of these bills since she also had to miss a ton of work. Thank you for taking the time to read this, I know Nicole will appreciate every prayer and penny.

story:
Hey There!

I'm Gina - President of GinaSpriggs.Guru.

I am a Holistic Intuitive and Mentor who helps align people with their intuition, power and purpose so they can help themselves and those around them.

I am widely known for my Sacred Journey Mastery Program and Enlightened Business Mastery Program that helps people harness their intuitive Super Powers and create successful businesses.

As a Master Tarologist with over 30 years’ experience, and proud owner of over 400 tarot and oracle decks, I've also authored The Intuitive Tarot Workbook - the first tarot workbook that helps you develop a relationship with each of your decks.

Learn about the difference between my Healing Oracle and other decks here

After being diagnosed with breast cancer in 2011, the topic of healing became a personal journey. I studied quantum physics, shamanism, chakra healing, medical intuition, plant spirit medicine, crystal healing, healing with sound, and a host of other modalities – which I combined with my intuitive wisdom and condensed it to its basic form, to share through experiential programs. 

But it wasn't until the 2016 cancer related deaths around me (I refer to them in the video), that I was inspired to the Lumin8 Healing Oracle tool.

Through the Lumin8 Healing Oracle, my goal is to bring a heightened level of awareness and personal power through the book, live event, group program. The Lumin8 Healing Oracle Deck is my largest project to date.

“Knowledge is something learned from a book, or gained from a teacher. True wisdom comes from experience. The Healing Oracle Deck, The Healing Oracle Book and The Healing Oracle Program are tools that support a personal transformation for each user….unlocking and activating the wisdom within us all…” ~ Gina Spriggs

Please continue to stay up to date at: GinaSpriggs.Guru

What You Get/How You Can Help

The Deck

With your intuition is your primary guide, I invite and assist you to explore the many ways you can use it. The Lumin8  Healing Oracle can be used as a healing, divination and self-exploration tool. It can be used by anyone, whether they are professional alternative practitioners themselves or desire a deeper level of self-awareness.

The deck is a full 55 card set. The cards will be high quality 3.5″ x 5” cards with rounded corners. The 55 images will be borderless.

The deck is available to those who donate $55 or more.

The Book

The full sized 5.5” x 8.5” book is an abbreviated version of the actual program. It comes complete with exercises. There are fourteen chapters that simple yet powerful, “how to’s”, insights, and resources.

The book and deck will be available to those who donate $75 or more. Chapter topics include:

  • Intro to Alternative Healing
  • 4 Levels of Awareness
  • Energy Mapping: An Intuitive Technique
  • Advanced Work with Chakras & Energy Bodies
  • Energy Laws & How to Break Them (Cords, Contracts, Curses and Bindings)
  • Intuitive use of Shape & Color
  • Intuitive use of Elements
  • Plant Spirit Energy *This chapter was not in the original program.

The Program

The 7 week on-line program Lumin8 Healing Oracle Program will initially be taught live. (The sessions will be recorded so they can be accessed for future donation, purchases and reference.) The live webinar sessions are exciting because you can ask questions, which will be addressed on the call. Each session is between 60 – 75 minutes, and ALWAYS includes an intuitive process.

"My "Aha Moment " was recognizing that each Chakra carries energy from the one "below" and "above": that Space in between needs attention." ~ Desiree S. Teacher & Participant New Jersey

The class is currently scheduled for January 2017, and will be available to those who donate $150 or more. *Book and deck delivered separately.

Life is magical when you understand what Gina is teaching. Everything is energy and can be manipulated by our intention. This means that truly life is only limited by what we can imagine and we have all kinds of energetic tools at our disposal. Recently, a client didn't like her "attitude toward money" program. But she did like a coworker's. And so I uninstalled her program, made a copy of his program and installed it in her field. That was a couple of week's ago. Today she told me she is shocked at how she has the same kind of confidence this guy has! ~ Sundi B., Participant, & Practicing Healer North Carolina

The Live Event

The Live Event will be nothing short of AMAZING! Here, you’ll get a chance to experience your Lumin8 Healing Oracle with yourself and others, reviewing and applying what you learned in the book and on-line. This event will be held in Charlotte, North Carolina in October 2017, and will be open to 70 backers who donate $.150

"My biggest "aha" moment came during the energy laws section. Bindings, even those created by loved ones, can be very powerful. Clearing your energy field often is very important. A great teacher inspires... Job well done!​" ~ Gina G. Participant, North Carolina

"I absolutely am loving this course and  so excited to be a part of it!  I really enjoy the way that you deliver your information and the class was so filled with lots and lots of great "stuff"...Carolyn T. Donor, Participant & Healer Hawaii

Reward Summary

  • Donations of $10 or more are awarded a signed thank you postcard featuring The Star Element, known for accomplishing purification of physical matter through spiritual truth and spiritual truth to form physical matter.
  • The Lumin8Healing Oracle deck & signed postcard are awarded to those who donate $55 or more.
  • The full sized 5.5” x 8.5” Lumin8 Healing Oracle book, deck and signed star postcard, will be awarded to those who donate $75 or more.
  • The 7 Week on-line Lumin8 Healing Oracle Program, Healing Oracle Book, and Healing Oracle Deck will be awarded to those who donate $150 or more.
  • BONUS:  LIVE Lumin8 Healing Oracle Event (Yup! Hands on support with me as your Guide) AND all the other goodies (postcard, deck, book and Lumin8 Healing Oracle 7-week on-line Program) are awarded to those who donate $150 or more (*Space is limited to 70)

Risks & Challenges

The majority of the costs are in the printing, shipping, and image acquisition. A substantial amount goes towards fees and taxes. The scanning/editing adds additional costs because I process that ensure the integrity of the images. 

The program is 100% complete, the book is 70% complete and the deck is in progress. All work will be completed by the time funds are released.

Delays are sometimes unavoidable, so I’ve done my research on proper budgeting of the entire project.The main unpredictable obstacle is possible delays in proofing and printing. I’ve given myself a very generous window and shipment date of October 2017.

I will continue to update this project page as well as the Lumin8 tab on GinaSpriggs.Guru with my progress and any potential setbacks that may occur.

You will always be in the loop right along with me. We're in this together and I am so excited about this amazing journey we’re sharing.

Another Way You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, (I get it..) but that doesn't mean you can't help.

Can you Spread The Word?  Make some noise about my campaign! (*Use the Indiegogo and any social media share tools.)

Thank you SO MUCH. I will keep you posted (I am SO excited!)

You Are Loved ~
