story:
Are you struggling with poor posture, stability or balance? The Calibrace restores feelings of stability and support by moving the shoulders up and back using our proprietary tensioning mechanism. 

Our goal for these next 30 days is to manufacture the Calibrace: the world's first back braces designed for the movement impaired.  We are raising money for our first manufacturing run in Rocky Mount, Virginia. 

Get the Calibrace now and support our movement!

Introducing the AbiliLife, Maker of the Calibrace!

We are AbiliLife, a company dedicated to creating biomedical products to improve the quality of life for people with movement impairments.  

AbiliLife is raising money to fund the manufacturing of the Calibrace, a brace designed for the movement impaired.  We want to foster awareness and community for those with movement impairments, their caregivers, family and loved ones.  While the brace was designed for those with movement impairments, it can be used by anyone who has back pain or poor posture.

By supporting our campaign, you would be be helping us improve the quality of life for people with movement impairments. They will feel more supported and stable while wearing the brace.




How It Works

The Calibrace works in a few ways; The front apron and stretch side panels provide circumferential stress in the torso reliving pain in the lower back.  Then, the patent pending tensioning system lifts the shoulders up and back, providing support to the spine.  The brace is also lightweight, breathable and discrete.  Thus, users can wear the brace under clothing.

Testing and Testimonials 

We have conducted extensive in house biomechanical lab testing and have seen posture improve by as much as nine degrees.  


Users also reported feeling supported while wearing the brace. Our users love our product.  Check out some of our customers' feedback while wearing the brace:  

“I am more upright”

“I can see out”

“I feel supported” 

“It’s easier to walk”

"I don't want to take it off"

"Whoa-I feel it working"





What We Need to Manufacture

  • We need $10,000 in order to manufacture these braces. All contributions will go directly to paying for the manufacturing run. 

How Does Indiegogo Work? 

Indiegogo is a tool for anyone with a product or a business to leverage the support needed for their projects. Indiegogo's platform allows businesses like us to share our project on the Internet. We provide product and fun experiences in exchange for  a funding contribution from you. 

If we don't reach our entire goal, the money will still be used for paying for the manufacturing run.

Can We Raise More Than Our Goal? 

Absolutely! $10,000 is just A PART of our budget and Indiegogo allows us to raise as much money as is given before the deadline. This means that we can manufacture more braces and get them on the backs of patients. 

 What You Get: Perks Galore

  • We are very excited to offer you these perks. Our favorite perk allows you to purchase the brace for yourself or a loved one at a great price!  You will be able to experience the relief and stability that comes from wearing the Calibrace. Want to help but don't need the brace? Consider donating one. You can also purchase a t-shirt or purchase a special webinar with the founders. Any contribution counts and will push us closer to our goal.
The Impact of Your Contribution

Your contribution will bring this product into the world and help get it onto the backs of the people who need it. You will be part of the solution that will improve the quality of life for the movement impaired. 

If you choose to purchase the Calibrace for yourself or a loved one, you will benefit from the stability and posture support of our patent-pending tensioning system.

The AbiliLife Team

We are the AbiliLife team. Courtney Williamson, CEO, started this company when she saw her mother, a Parkinson's patient, struggling with balance and posture. When she discovered there were no products that could solve this problem, she set out to change that and help other people with Parkinson's. 

Noah Papas, CTO, engineered and tested the Calibrace, bringing his and Courtney's vision into the world. 

Eleanor Haglund, Director of Marketing, joined the company because her grandfather has Parkinson's. Her goal is to get the Calibrace into the hands of every person who needs it. 

Britta Ulm, Principal Engineer, has been instrumental to the creation of Calibrace and moving AbiliLife forward.

Our Partners

 

We have partnered with the Davis Phinney Foundation and the Parkinson's Foundation of Western Pennsylvania to raise the money to manufacture the Calibrace. We thank them for their support and all they do for the Parkinson's community.

Press

                  

       


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help:

  • Share our link on social media!
  • Email those who need the Calibrace and ask them to check out our campaign! 
  • Tell your friends!
  • Tell your friend's friends!
Thank you! 

Frequently Asked Questions 

What are the advantages of wearing the Calibrace?

There are many benefits to wearing the Calibrace. Those who have worn the brace stated their fear of falling was significantly reduced. Wearing the brace helps to create a sense of dignity, as a person can walk and sit upright while engaging in everyday activities. 


Can the brace be used for people who do not have Parkinson's disease or movement disorders? 

Yes, we recommend the brace for those with and without Parkinson's disease. The Calibrace is effective for patients with lower back pain, herniated disks, multiple sclerosis, and ALS.  It has also been extremely beneficial for people with poor posture. 


What is the brace made of? 

High tech, comfortable, breathable and stretchable fabrics materials make up the body of the brace. The removable aluminum spine is cushioned within a thick fabric and provides support and rigidity to the brace without adding weight.  


Why should the Calibrace be adjusted to fit as tight as comfortably comfortable? 

Wearing the brace as tight as comfortable provides support to your lower back and helps prevent Calibrace from riding up. 


Can I sit while wearing the Calibrace? 

Yes, you can comfortably sit, stand, walk, run, exercise, and conduct every day activities in the brace. The Calibrace was designed to promote activity. As such, the brace is comfortable and easy to wear throughout the day.  

Which size should I purchase? 

 

Is the brace washable?   

Yes! Wash in your home machine in cold water on the delicate cycle and air dry. Make sure you remove the aluminum spine!


Should I wear the Calibrace under or over my clothes?   

You can wear the Calibrace against your skin or over your clothing. The Calibrace is designed and manufactured to be worn both over and under clothing.


How long should I wear the Calibrace?  

You can wear the Calibrace at your discretion. Some customers prefer to wear the brace all day for added support. Others prefer to wear the brace during select activities such as exercise or for special occasions that call for improved posture.

By supporting our campaign, you would be be helping us improve the quality of life for people with movement impairments. They will feel more supported and stable while wearing the brace.











How It Works
The Calibrace works in a few ways; The front apron and stretch side panels provide circumferential stress in the torso reliving pain in the lower back.  Then, the patent pending tensioning system lifts the shoulders up and back, providing support to the spine.  The brace is also lightweight, breathable and discrete.  Thus, users can wear the brace under clothing.

Testing and Testimonials 
We have conducted extensive in house biomechanical lab testing and have seen posture improve by as much as nine degrees.  


Users also reported feeling supported while wearing the brace. Our users love our product.  Check out some of our customers' feedback while wearing the brace:  
“I am more upright”
“I can see out”
“I feel supported” 
“It’s easier to walk”
"I don't want to take it off"
"Whoa-I feel it working"















What We Need to Manufacture
We need $10,000 in order to manufacture these braces. All contributions will go directly to paying for the manufacturing run. 





How Does Indiegogo Work? 
Indiegogo is a tool for anyone with a product or a business to leverage the support needed for their projects. Indiegogo's platform allows businesses like us to share our project on the Internet. We provide product and fun experiences in exchange for  a funding contribution from you. 
If we don't reach our entire goal, the money will still be used for paying for the manufacturing run.
Can We Raise More Than Our Goal? 
Absolutely! $10,000 is just A PART of our budget and Indiegogo allows us to raise as much money as is given before the deadline. This means that we can manufacture more braces and get them on the backs of patients. 
 What You Get: Perks Galore

 We are very excited to offer you these perks. Our favorite perk allows you to purchase the brace for yourself or a loved one at a great price!  You will be able to experience the relief and stability that comes from wearing the Calibrace. Want to help but don't need the brace? Consider donating one. You can also purchase a t-shirt or purchase a special webinar with the founders. Any contribution counts and will push us closer to our goal.


The Impact of Your Contribution


 Your contribution will bring this product into the world and help get it onto the backs of the people who need it. You will be part of the solution that will improve the quality of life for the movement impaired. 
If you choose to purchase the Calibrace for yourself or a loved one, you will benefit from the stability and posture support of our patent-pending tensioning system.   
The AbiliLife Team

We are the AbiliLife team. Courtney Williamson, CEO, started this company when she saw her mother, a Parkinson's patient, struggling with balance and posture. When she discovered there were no products that could solve this problem, she set out to change that and help other people with Parkinson's. 
Noah Papas, CTO, engineered and tested the Calibrace, bringing his and Courtney's vision into the world. 
Eleanor Haglund, Director of Marketing, joined the company because her grandfather has Parkinson's. Her goal is to get the Calibrace into the hands of every person who needs it. 
Britta Ulm, Principal Engineer, has been instrumental to the creation of Calibrace and moving AbiliLife forward.
Our Partners

 
We have partnered with the Davis Phinney Foundation and the Parkinson's Foundation of Western Pennsylvania to raise the money to manufacture the Calibrace. We thank them for their support and all they do for the Parkinson's community.
Press

                  
       







Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute, you can still help:  Share our link on social media!
Email those who need the Calibrace and ask them to check out our campaign! 
Tell your friends!
Tell your friend's friends!

Thank you! 


Frequently Asked Questions 


What are the advantages
of wearing the Calibrace?


There are many benefits to wearing the Calibrace. Those who have worn the brace stated their fear of falling was significantly reduced. Wearing the brace helps to create a sense of dignity, as a person can walk and sit upright while engaging in everyday activities. 


Can the brace be used for people who do not have Parkinson's disease or movement disorders? 
Yes, we recommend the brace for those with and without Parkinson's disease. The Calibrace is effective for patients with lower back pain, herniated disks, multiple sclerosis, and ALS.  It has also been extremely beneficial for people with poor posture. 

What is the brace made of? 

High tech, comfortable, breathable and stretchable fabrics
materials make up the body of the brace. The removable aluminum spine is cushioned within a thick fabric and provides support
and rigidity to the brace without adding weight.  

Why should the Calibrace be adjusted to fit as tight as comfortably comfortable? 

Wearing the brace as tight as comfortable provides support to your lower back and helps prevent Calibrace from riding
up. 


Can I sit while wearing the Calibrace? 
Yes, you can comfortably sit, stand, walk, run, exercise, and conduct every day activities in the brace. The Calibrace was designed to promote activity. As such, the brace is comfortable and easy to wear throughout the day.  
Which size should I purchase? 
 


Is the brace washable?   
Yes! Wash in your home machine in cold water on the
delicate cycle and air dry. Make sure you remove the aluminum spine!

Should I wear the Calibrace under or over my clothes?   

You
can wear the Calibrace against your skin or over your clothing. The Calibrace is
designed and manufactured to be worn both over and under clothing.


How long should I wear the Calibrace?  
You can wear the Calibrace at your discretion. Some customers prefer to wear the brace all day for added support. Others prefer to wear the brace during select activities such as exercise or for special occasions that call for improved posture.

story:
Versión española

BodyBrush

In BodyBrush we care about your personal well-being and, therefore, we have developed a wide range of products that will help to improve your quality of life.

Our shower head allows you to perform various body beauty treatments while taking a revitalizing shower.

In addition, our wide range of creams and oils perfectly complement the use of our other products.

 

BodyBrush Shower Head

BodyBrush is an innovative set of shower head and accessories (patent pending) for corporal health, designed specifically to recover the radiant splendour of healthy skin. With a daily massage and cleaning with BodyBrush you will recover the shine on the skin, tone up your body and reduce cellulite.

The skin brushing removes the old dead layer of the epidermis, sweat and other bodily waste products generated by human metabolism. Its long handle allows you to reach those hard to reach areas.

 

Accessories

Brush

To feel and look good, body brushing is an essential part of the treatment. Brushing the body as part of the corporal cleaning routine will give you a soft skin and improve the corporal hygiene on having managed to penetrate more into the skin's pores.

A good brushing will allow you to remove dead skin cells and clear pores blocked by sweat, improving, in this way, our body's perspiration. For successful results, a dry brushing must be done before the shower because this will help to stimulate the skin and remove desquamations. Then, make a wet brushing during shower or bath.

The greatest benefits are obtained by brushing the body towards the heart, forming clockwise circles. This will activate blood circulation and stimulate the lymphatic system which is in charge of eliminating the waste responsible for the cellulite.

  

There are different hardnesses in the bristles adapted to different types of skin. Sensitive skins should use soft bristles and normal skins harder bristles. The skin may redden and feel a tingling as the body brushing increases the circulation in areas of high concentration of fats. The applied pressure should depend on the skin and body toning. At first you should brush gently. The skin will tone up quickly and soon it will be possible to brush more vigorously and, if possible, with better results.

If more than one person in the family practice body brushing, each person must have his/her own brush.

 

Sponge

       

This sponge is an accessory that complements the daily hygiene of the shower, allowing greater depth in cleaning germs and bacteria off the skin. This accessory allows lathering and distributing BodyBrush gel or soap evenly throughout the body, while applying hot or cold water, depending on the user's desire.

Do not forget to use BodyBrush mild soap to avoid oily or dry skin. The most important thing when using the sponge is that once used, it

must be properly rinsed, removing product residues and letting it dry properly in a well ventilated area. The BodyBrush sponge has open pores, so that water passes completely preventing soap scum remaining inside and accelerating the drying process, thus improving the hygiene of the accessory.

 

Synthetic Pumice

The callus (thickening and hardening of the skin surface) in feet, heels, hands and elbows are one of the aesthetic problems that can be avoided with appropriate care.

The application of water will soften the skin and prepare it for rubbing, gently, the affected skin area with BodyBrush synthetic pumice. This synthetic pumice is made of cellular glass and, thanks to this composition, it does not absorb liquids and bacteria, fungi and microorganisms neither survive in its surface nor penetrate in its interior, avoiding possible infections.

Just like the brush, there are two types of synthetic pumice, depending on the pore size:

 

Exfoliating sponge

The accessory to exfoliate the skin will get the dead cells removed from the superficial layers of the dermis, thus preventing blocked pores, getting a clearer skin and preventing cellulite.

At the end of the shower, after having used BodyBrush soap or gel to wash the skin, the whole body is to be massaged with circular movements with this exfoliating sponge. Be careful not to rub too hard, as this may damage the skin. Pay particular attention to areas prone to callus, such as elbows or knees, or wrinkles, like chest and neck.

  
 

That would be also a good time to use BodyBrush pumice stone on your feet since the exfoliating sponge will not solve the problem. Both accessories are used in combination, since the BodyBrush pumice is too hard for other body areas. Do not forget to exfoliate your hands, they need it the same or even more than the rest of the body.

Applying hot water while rubbing the area circularly, will help to remove debris and keeping your skin clean and smooth at all times. Alternating between hot and cold water will help to stimulate blood circulation to the skin. This gives a pleasant state of relaxation.

The use of this accessory is not recommended for babies or damaged skins, with wounds or irritated. It is not recommended to exfoliate more than once a week.

Like the regular sponge, this sponge is open-pored, therefore the water passes completely preventing soap scum remaining inside and accelerating the drying process, thus improving the hygiene of the accessory.

 

Anti-cellulite accessories

Cellulite is a problem that affects 90% of women and 10% of men. It is formed when fat cells store fat, water and toxins, increasing the initial volume of the adipocyte giving the appearance of "orange skin" and preventing the blood from circulating correctly.

This change stems from complications of the lymphatic circulation (responsible for transporting waste substances in our body), due to various factors that may be hormonal, congenital, alimentary, lifestyle or psychological.

BodyBrush anti-cellulite accessories help to tone up, to mold, to get silky skin and to reduce the unsightly effects of "orange skin" and the problems of fluid retention. Together with hot and cold water alternated spurts, they stimulate blood circulation to provide the skin the necessary nutrients, while gliding it with pressure for the most affected areas to stimulate the lymph nodes and undo cellulite nodules, such that the fat accumulated in the surface is distributed uniformly to obtain a smooth skin.

 

Tips: It is not recommended to apply more than 15 minutes in each zone. To combat cellulite it is also necessary to follow a series of recommendations as to follow a low-fat diet (without meats, fried food, sausages, etc) and rich in vegetables and fruit, drink plenty of water, raise the legs when resting and do the necessary exercise to burn the extra fats accumulated. This accessory helps to reduce the effects of cellulite but perseverance is needed to have good habits on a daily basis.

 

Creams and oils

In collaboration with Bio Cositas buenas S.L., manufacturer of certified organic cosmetics, we've developped a line of products which will complement perfectly with our shower head and accessories.

Body milk

This is a very pleasant to apply body lotion which is quickly absorbed. It leaves skin hydrated with a pleasant feeling of softness and elasticity thanks to the combination of its ingredients. It penetrates easily and it's suitable for all skin types.

Composed of sweet almond oil, avocado oil, shea butter, witch-hazel and centella asiatica.

    

Sweet almond oil

It provides elasticity to the skin, leaving it soft, nourished and moisturized. It is widely used as the basis for massages, alone or with other essential oils, because of its emollient and anti-inflammatory properties and its ability to soften without blocking pores. It lubricates and protects, being very appropriate for allergies and irritation problems since it has soothing effects. It prevents and repairs stretch marks and wrinkles. It is ideal to apply it in very sensitive skins like baby skin.

With great nutritional and demulcents properties, it provides the skin with an intense moisturizing, even in those worst harmed skins.

    

Aloe Vera Balsam

Made of 100% pure aloe vera juice from Fuerteventura. Aloe vera mosturises deeply, it's a cell regenerator. It is rich in acids and vitamin B complex, which make it unique as antioxidant, softening, revitalising and skin regenerating agent, thus being suitable for juvenile acne, irritation, burns, insect bites, solar exposure, hair removal, shaving... It has the ability to tone and heal.

It contains cucumber cultivated in Spain that increases this balsam soothing and softening action.

It also contains carrageenan, a gum which comes from the seaweed, rich in polysaccharides that helps to create a thin protective film.

    

Shea butter and rosehip

This mix takes in conjunction the properties of rosehip and shea butter. It regenerates the superficial layers of the skin and gives firmness and elasticity to it. It is recommended in the treatment of dry, aged, irritated or sensitive skins. It reduces stretch marks and prevent their appearance. It also protects from external aggressions, thus its use being recommended after solar exposure and physical activity. It can be also used as a hair mask.

    

Red clay face pack

Face pack with purifying and hydrating properties.

The red clay cleans thoroughly by eliminating the excess of fat and black spots without drying the skin and leaving it toned. It has astringent properties. It is cicatrizant and helps the regeneration of the cells in addition to having an anti-inflammatory effect. It is suitable for sensitive skin.

This face pack also contains acai, stinging nettle and peppermint.

    

Facial exfoliating cream

Complete exfoliating cream which prepares the skin for further protection, nutrition and moisturizing.

Based on micro-granules of apricot seed which make a gentle and natural exfoliation, stimulate facial circulation, releasing dead skin cells and allowing their cellular repair, giving the skin back its glow, strength and maintaining its elasticity.

It also contains lemon balm, mallow, calendula and aloe vera.

    

 

What we need & what you will get

All we need now is your help! At present, we have a series of fully working prototypes, obtained by temporary molds. We need the money to get optimized injection molds for manufacturing and defray the handling and packaging costs.

The perks

1. For $1 you will appear as contributor on our webpage.

2. For $5 you will receive a 5% discount voucher valid for one year.

3. For $35 you will get the BodyBrush starter kit:

4. For $50 you will get the BodyBrush basic kit:

5. For $60 you will get the BodyBrush standard kit:

6. For $90 you will get the BodyBrush complete kit:

7. For $135 you will get everything!

   
   

8. For $500 you will get 5 of evertyhing

   

9. For $1000 you will get 11 of evertyhing

   

10. For $2000 you will get 23 of evertyhing and with customizable shower heads (you can add a text or image!)

   

 

Shipping

If your perk exceeds $90, you will have FREE shipping costs. In any other case, you will have to pay the shipping costs according to your shipping address and the following region map:

REGION A  $5             REGION B  $11              REGION C  $15

 

You must add the appropriate amount to your perk and change it manually before placing it. For example, if you choose the Starter perk ($35) and your shipping address is in region B, you must change the amount to $46.

 

Thank you for contributing!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

VERSIÓN ESPAÑOLA

 

BodyBrush

En BodyBrush nos preocupamos por su bienestar personal y, por ello, hemos desarrollado una gran gama de productos que ayudarán a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Nuestro teléfono de ducha le permitirá realizar diversos tratamientos de belleza corporal al tiempo que toma una revitalizante ducha.

Además, nuestra gama de cremas y aceites complementarán a la perfección el uso del resto de nuestros productos.

 

Teleducha BodyBrush

BodyBrush es un innovador conjunto de teleducha y accesorios (patente en trámites) para la salud corporal, diseñado específicamente para recuperar el esplendor radiante de una piel sana. Con una limpieza con masaje diario de BodyBrush recuperará el brillo en la piel, tonificará su cuerpo y reducirá la celulitis.

El cepillado de la piel elimina la capa vieja y muerta de la epidermis, el sudor y otros productos de desecho corporal que genera el metabolismo humano. Su largo mango le permitirá llegar a aquellas zonas de difícil acceso.

Accesorios

Cepillo

Para sentirse bien y tener un buen aspecto, el cepillado del cuerpo es una parte indispensable del tratamiento. Cepillar el cuerpo como parte de la rutina de limpieza corporal, le permitirá obtener una piel suave y mejorar la higiene corporal al conseguir profundizar más en los poros de la piel.

Un buen cepillado nos permitirá eliminar células de piel muerta así como limpiar los poros obstruidos por el sudor, de esta manera mejoraremos la transpiración de nuestro cuerpo. Para mayor éxito en los resultados, debe realizarse un cepillado en seco previo a la ducha porque esto ayudará a estimular la piel y eliminar descamaciones. Entonces, realizar el cepillado en mojado durante la ducha o baño.

  

Los mayores beneficios se obtienen cepillando el cuerpo en sentido hacia el corazón, formando círculos en sentido horario. Esto activará la circulación sanguínea y estimulará el sistema linfático que es el que se encarga de eliminar los desechos responsables de la celulitis.

Existen diferentes durezas en las cerdas adaptadas a los diferentes tipos de piel. Las pieles sensibles deberán utilizar cerdas suaves y las pieles normales las cerdas de mayor dureza. La piel puede enrojecerse y sentirse un hormigueo a medida que el cepillado corporal aumenta la circulación en áreas de alta concentración de grasas. La presión ejercida deberá depender de la tonificación de piel y cuerpo. Al principio debe cepillarse suavemente. La piel se tonificará rápidamente y pronto se podrá cepillar más vigorosamente y con, si cabe, mejores resultados.

Si más de una persona en la familia practica el cepillado corporal, cada persona debe tener su propio cepillo.

 

Esponja

       

Esta esponja es un accesorio que complementa la higiene diaria de la ducha, permitiendo una mayor profundidad en la limpieza de gérmenes y bacterias en la piel. Este accesorio permite enjabonarse y repartir el jabón o gel BodyBrush de manera uniforme por todo el cuerpo, mientras se aplica agua caliente o fría, según el deseo del usuario.

No debe olvidarse usar el jabón neutro BodyBrush para evitar la piel grasa o seca.

Lo más importante del uso de la esponja es que una vez usada, hay que enjuagarla correctamente, quitándole restos de producto y dejarla secar adecuadamente en un área bien ventilada. A la esponja BodyBrush se le ha hecho un orificio en el centro para permitir que pase completamente el agua, evitando que se queden restos de jabón en el interior, mejorando así la higiene del accesorio.

 

Piedra Pómez Sintética

Las durezas (engrosamiento y endurecimiento de la parte superficial de la piel) en pies, talones, manos y codos son uno de los problemas estéticos que se pueden evitar con los cuidados oportunos.

La aplicación del agua reblandecerá la piel y la preparará para poder frotar, de forma suave, la zona de piel afectada con la piedra pómez sintética BodyBrush. Esta piedra pómez sintética está hecha de vidrio celular y, gracias a esta composición, no absorbe líquidos y las bacterias, hongos y microorganismos no sobreviven en su superficie ni penetran en su interior, evitando posibles infecciones.

Como con el cepillo, existen dos tipos de piedra pómez sintética, dependiendo del tamaño del poro:

 

Esponja exfoliante

El accesorio para exfoliar la piel logrará eliminar las células muertas de las capas superficiales de la dermis, de este modo se evitara que los poros se tapen, obteniendo una piel más limpia y previniendo la celulitis.

Al final de la ducha, después de haber usado jabón o gel BodyBrush para lavar la piel, se masajea el cuerpo entero con movimientos circulares con la esponja exfoliante BodyBrush. Hay que tener cuidado de no frotar demasiado fuerte, ya que se podría dañar la piel.

  
 

Debe prestarse especial atención a las áreas propensas a las durezas, como codos o rodillas, o a las arrugas, como pecho y cuello. Éste es también un buen momento para usar la piedra pómez BodyBrush en los pies, ya que la esponja exfoliante no resolverá el problema. Los dos accesorios se usan en combinación, ya que la piedra pómez BodyBrush es demasiado dura para otras áreas del cuerpo. No debe olvidarse exfoliar las manos, que lo necesitan tanto o más que el resto del cuerpo.

Aplique agua caliente mientras frota la zona de forma circular, esto ayudará a eliminar los restos y a mantener una piel limpia y suave en todo momento. Alternar entre agua fría y caliente ayudará a estimular la circulación sanguínea hacia la piel. Con esto se consigue un agradable estado de relajación.

El uso de este accesorio no es recomendable en bebés ni en pieles dañadas, con heridas o irritadas. No es recomendable realizar la exfoliación más de una vez a la semana.

Al igual que la esponja normal, esta esponja es de poros abiertos, por lo que deja pasar completamente el agua evitando que se queden restos de jabón en el interior y acelerando el proceso de secado, mejorando así la higiene del accesorio.

 

Accesorios anticelulíticos

La celulitis es un problema que afecta al 90% de las mujeres y al 10% de los hombres. Se forma cuando los adipocitos acumulan grasa, agua y toxinas, aumentando el volumen inicial del adipocito dando ese aspecto de piel de "naranja" y evitando que la sangre circule correctamente.

Esta alteración tiene su origen en la complicación de la circulación linfática (encargada de transportar las sustancias de desecho de nuestro cuerpo), debido a diversos factores que pueden ser de tipo hormonal, congénito, alimentario, estilo de vida o psicológico.

Los accesorios anticelulíticos BodyBrush ayudan a tonificar, moldear, conseguir una piel sedosa y reducir los efectos antiestéticos de la piel de "naranja" así como los problemas de retención de líquidos. Junto a chorros alternados de agua fría y caliente se estimula la circulación sanguínea para aportar a la piel los nutrientes necesarios, al mismo tiempo, se desliza con presión el accesorio por aquellas zonas más afectadas para estimular los nodos linfáticos y deshacer los nódulos de celulitis, de tal manera que la grasa acumulada en la superficie se distribuya de forma uniforme para obtener una piel lisa.

 

Consejos: No es recomendable aplicar más de 15 minutos en cada zona. Para combatir la celulitis también es necesario seguir una serie de recomendaciones como seguir una dieta baja en grasas nocivas (carnes, fritos, embutidos, etc...) y rica en verduras y fruta, beber mucha agua, elevar las piernas cuando estemos en reposo y hacer el ejercicio necesario para quemar la grasas extra acumuladas. Este accesorio ayuda a disminuir los efectos de la celulitis pero es necesaria su constancia en tener unos hábitos saludables de forma diaria.

 

Cremas y aceites

En colaboración con Bio Cositas buenas S.L., fabricante de productos de cosmética ecológica certificada, hemos desarrollado una línea de productos que complementa perfectamente nuestra teleducha y accesorios.

Leche corporal

Crema corporal muy agradable de aplicar y de rápida absorción. Deja la piel hidratada con una agradable sensación de suavidad y elasticidad gracias a la combinación de sus ingredientes. Penetra fácilmente. Es apropiada para todo tipo de piel.

Compuesta de aceite de almendra, aceite de aguacate, manteca de karité, hamamelis y centella asiática.

    

Aceite de almendra

Proporciona elasticidad a la piel, dejándola hidratada, nutrida y suave. Es muy utilizado como base de masajes solo o con aceites esenciales por sus propiedades emolientes y antiinflamatorias y por su capacidad para suavizar sin obstruir los poros. Lubrica y protege siendo muy adecuado para problemas de irritación y alergias ya que produce efectos calmantes. Previene y repara estrías y arrugas. Es óptimo para aplicar en pieles muy sensibles como la de los bebés.

Con grandes propiedades nutritivas y demulcentes, proporciona a la piel una intensa hidratación, incluso en aquellas pieles más castigadas.

    

Bálsamo de Aloe Vera

Procedente de zumo 100% puro de aloe vera de Fuerteventura. El Aloe vera hidrata en profundidad, es un regenerador celular. Rico en ácidos y complejo de vitamina B, que lo hacen único como agente antioxidante, suavizante, revitalizante y regenerante de la piel, por lo que es adecuado para el acné juvenil, irritaciones, quemaduras, picaduras de insectos, exposición solar, depilación, afeitado… Tiene capacidad cicatrizante y tonificante.

Con pepino cultivado en España que refuerza la acción calmante y suavizante de este bálsamo.

También contiene carragenato, una goma proveniente de algas marinas, rica en polisacáridos que ayuda a crear una fina película protectora.

    

Manteca de Karité y Rosa Mosqueta

Esta mezcla reúne las propiedades de la manteca de Karité con las de la Rosa Mosqueta. Regenera las capas superficiales de la piel, da firmeza y elasticidad a la piel. Indicada en el tratamiento de pieles secas, envejecidas, irritadas y sensibles. Reduce las estrías y evita su aparición. Protege de las agresiones externas, se recomienda su uso después de la exposición al sol y para las actividades físicas. Se puede usar como mascarilla capilar.

    

Mascarilla de arcilla roja

Mascarilla con propiedades hidratantes y purificantes.

La arcilla roja limpia en profundidad eliminando el exceso de grasa y puntos negros sin resecar dejando la piel tonificada. Tiene propiedades astringentes. Es muy cicatrizante ayudando a la regeneración de las células además de tener un efecto antiinflamatorio. Está indicada para pieles sensibles.

Esta mascarilla contiene también acai, ortiga y menta.

    

Exfoliante facial

Completo exfoliante que prepara la piel para su posterior hidratación, nutrición y protección.

A base de microgránulos de semilla de albaricoque que producen una exfoliación suave y natural, que activan la circulación facial, liberando a la piel de las células muertas y permitiendo su renovación celular, haciendo que la piel recupere su luminosidad, fortaleciendo la piel y manteniéndola más elástica.

También contiene melisa, malva, caléndula y aloe vera.

    

 

Qué necesitamos y qué obtienes

¡Todo lo que necesitamos ahora es tu ayuda! De momento, disponemos de una serie de prototipos totalmente funcionales, obtenidos con moldes temporales. Necesitamos el dinero para conseguir moldes de inyección optimizados para la fabricación del producto y sufragar los costes de manipulación y embalaje.

Beneficios

1. Por $1 aparecerás como donante en nuestra página web

2. Por $5 recibirás un vale de descuento del 5% válido durante un año

3. Por $35 conseguirás un kit inicial de BodyBrush:

4. Por $50 conseguirás un kit básico de BodyBrush:

5. Por $60 conseguirás un kit estándar de BodyBrush:

6. Por $90 conseguirás un kit completo de BodyBrush:

7. Por $135 lo tendrás todo!

   
   

8. Por $500 conseguirás 5 de todo

   

9. Por $1000 conseguirás 11 de todo

   

10. Por $2000 conseguirás 23 de todo y con los telefonillos personalizables (¡se puede añadir un texto o imagen!)

   

 

Envío

Si tu donativo supera los $90, los gastos de envío serán GRATUITOS. En cualquier otro caso, deberás pagar los gastos de envío según tu dirección de envío y el siguiente mapa zonal:

ZONA A  $5             ZONA B  $11             ZONA C  $15

 

Debes añadir la cantidad correspondiente manualmente a tu donación antes de realizarla. Por ejemplo, si eliges el kit inicial (de $35) y tu dirección de envío se encuentra en la zona B, deberás cambiar la cantidad y poner $46.

 

¡¡Gracias por donar!!
story_txt:
Versión española 
BodyBrush
In BodyBrush we care about your personal well-being and, therefore, we have developed a wide range of products that will help to improve your quality of life.
Our shower head allows you to perform various body beauty treatments while taking a revitalizing shower.
In addition, our wide range of creams and oils perfectly complement the use of our other products.



 
BodyBrush Shower Head
BodyBrush is an innovative set of shower head and accessories (patent pending) for corporal health, designed specifically to recover the radiant splendour of healthy skin. With a daily massage and cleaning with BodyBrush you will recover the shine on the skin, tone up your body and reduce cellulite.
The skin brushing removes the old dead layer of the epidermis, sweat and other bodily waste products generated by human metabolism. Its long handle allows you to reach those hard to reach areas.
 


Accessories
Brush


To feel and look good, body brushing is an essential part of the treatment. Brushing the body as part of the corporal cleaning routine will give you a soft skin and improve the corporal hygiene on having managed to penetrate more into the skin's pores.
A good brushing will allow you to remove dead skin cells and clear pores blocked by sweat, improving, in this way, our body's perspiration. For successful results, a dry brushing must be done before the shower because this will help to stimulate the skin and remove desquamations. Then, make a wet brushing during shower or bath.
The greatest benefits are obtained by brushing the body towards the heart, forming clockwise circles. This will activate blood circulation and stimulate the lymphatic system which is in charge of eliminating the waste responsible for the cellulite.

 



There are different hardnesses in the bristles adapted to different types of skin. Sensitive skins should use soft bristles and normal skins harder bristles. The skin may redden and feel a tingling as the body brushing increases the circulation in areas of high concentration of fats. The applied pressure should depend on the skin and body toning. At first you should brush gently. The skin will tone up quickly and soon it will be possible to brush more vigorously and, if possible, with better results.
If more than one person in the family practice body brushing, each person must have his/her own brush.
 
Sponge


 
 
 
 

This sponge is an accessory that complements the daily hygiene of the shower, allowing greater depth in cleaning germs and bacteria off the skin. This accessory allows lathering and distributing BodyBrush gel or soap evenly throughout the body, while applying hot or cold water, depending on the user's desire.
Do not forget to use BodyBrush mild soap to avoid oily or dry skin. The most important thing when using the sponge is that once used, it


must be properly rinsed, removing product residues and letting it dry properly in a well ventilated area. The BodyBrush sponge has open pores, so that water passes completely preventing soap scum remaining inside and accelerating the drying process, thus improving the hygiene of the accessory.
 
Synthetic Pumice
The callus (thickening and hardening of the skin surface) in feet, heels, hands and elbows are one of the aesthetic problems that can be avoided with appropriate care.
The application of water will soften the skin and prepare it for rubbing, gently, the affected skin area with BodyBrush synthetic pumice. This synthetic pumice is made of cellular glass and, thanks to this composition, it does not absorb liquids and bacteria, fungi and microorganisms neither survive in its surface nor penetrate in its interior, avoiding possible infections.
Just like the brush, there are two types of synthetic pumice, depending on the pore size:




 
Exfoliating sponge



The accessory to exfoliate the skin will get the dead cells removed from the superficial layers of the dermis, thus preventing blocked pores, getting a clearer skin and preventing cellulite.
At the end of the shower, after having used BodyBrush soap or gel to wash the skin, the whole body is to be massaged with circular movements with this exfoliating sponge. Be careful not to rub too hard, as this may damage the skin. Pay particular attention to areas prone to callus, such as elbows or knees, or wrinkles, like chest and neck.

 



 



That would be also a good time to use BodyBrush pumice stone on your feet since the exfoliating sponge will not solve the problem. Both accessories are used in combination, since the BodyBrush pumice is too hard for other body areas. Do not forget to exfoliate your hands, they need it the same or even more than the rest of the body.
Applying hot water while rubbing the area circularly, will help to remove debris and keeping your skin clean and smooth at all times. Alternating between hot and cold water will help to stimulate blood circulation to the skin. This gives a pleasant state of relaxation.
The use of this accessory is not recommended for babies or damaged skins, with wounds or irritated. It is not recommended to exfoliate more than once a week.
Like the regular sponge, this sponge is open-pored, therefore the water passes completely preventing soap scum remaining inside and accelerating the drying process, thus improving the hygiene of the accessory.
 
Anti-cellulite accessories
Cellulite is a problem that affects 90% of women and 10% of men. It is formed when fat cells store fat, water and toxins, increasing the initial volume of the adipocyte giving the appearance of "orange skin" and preventing the blood from circulating correctly.
This change stems from complications of the lymphatic circulation (responsible for transporting waste substances in our body), due to various factors that may be hormonal, congenital, alimentary, lifestyle or psychological.
BodyBrush anti-cellulite accessories help to tone up, to mold, to get silky skin and to reduce the unsightly effects of "orange skin" and the problems of fluid retention. Together with hot and cold water alternated spurts, they stimulate blood circulation to provide the skin the necessary nutrients, while gliding it with pressure for the most affected areas to stimulate the lymph nodes and undo cellulite nodules, such that the fat accumulated in the surface is distributed uniformly to obtain a smooth skin.


 


Tips: It is not recommended to apply more than 15 minutes in each zone. To combat cellulite it is also necessary to follow a series of recommendations as to follow a low-fat diet (without meats, fried food, sausages, etc) and rich in vegetables and fruit, drink plenty of water, raise the legs when resting and do the necessary exercise to burn the extra fats accumulated. This accessory helps to reduce the effects of cellulite but perseverance is needed to have good habits on a daily basis.
 
Creams and oils
In collaboration with Bio Cositas buenas S.L., manufacturer of certified organic cosmetics, we've developped a line of products which will complement perfectly with our shower head and accessories.
Body milk


This is a very pleasant to apply body lotion which is quickly absorbed. It leaves skin hydrated with a pleasant feeling of softness and elasticity thanks to the combination of its ingredients. It penetrates easily and it's suitable for all skin types.
Composed of sweet almond oil, avocado oil, shea butter, witch-hazel and centella asiatica.

 
 


Sweet almond oil


It provides elasticity to the skin, leaving it soft, nourished and moisturized. It is widely used as the basis for massages, alone or with other essential oils, because of its emollient and anti-inflammatory properties and its ability to soften without blocking pores. It lubricates and protects, being very appropriate for allergies and irritation problems since it has soothing effects. It prevents and repairs stretch marks and wrinkles. It is ideal to apply it in very sensitive skins like baby skin.
With great nutritional and demulcents properties, it provides the skin with an intense moisturizing, even in those worst harmed skins.

 
 


Aloe Vera Balsam


Made of 100% pure aloe vera juice from Fuerteventura. Aloe vera mosturises deeply, it's a cell regenerator. It is rich in acids and vitamin B complex, which make it unique as antioxidant, softening, revitalising and skin regenerating agent, thus being suitable for juvenile acne, irritation, burns, insect bites, solar exposure, hair removal, shaving... It has the ability to tone and heal.
It contains cucumber cultivated in Spain that increases this balsam soothing and softening action.
It also contains carrageenan, a gum which comes from the seaweed, rich in polysaccharides that helps to create a thin protective film.

 
 


Shea butter and rosehip


This mix takes in conjunction the properties of rosehip and shea butter. It regenerates the superficial layers of the skin and gives firmness and elasticity to it. It is recommended in the treatment of dry, aged, irritated or sensitive skins. It reduces stretch marks and prevent their appearance. It also protects from external aggressions, thus its use being recommended after solar exposure and physical activity. It can be also used as a hair mask.

 
 


Red clay face pack


Face pack with purifying and hydrating properties.
The red clay cleans thoroughly by eliminating the excess of fat and black spots without drying the skin and leaving it toned. It has astringent properties. It is cicatrizant and helps the regeneration of the cells in addition to having an anti-inflammatory effect. It is suitable for sensitive skin.
This face pack also contains acai, stinging nettle and peppermint.

 
 


Facial exfoliating cream


Complete exfoliating cream which prepares the skin for further protection, nutrition and moisturizing.
Based on micro-granules of apricot seed which make a gentle and natural exfoliation, stimulate facial circulation, releasing dead skin cells and allowing their cellular repair, giving the skin back its glow, strength and maintaining its elasticity.
It also contains lemon balm, mallow, calendula and aloe vera.

 
 


 
What we need & what you will get
All we need now is your help! At present, we have a series of fully working prototypes, obtained by temporary molds. We need the money to get optimized injection molds for manufacturing and defray the handling and packaging costs.
The perks
1. For $1 you will appear as contributor on our webpage.
2. For $5 you will receive a 5% discount voucher valid for one year.
3. For $35 you will get the BodyBrush starter kit:

4. For $50 you will get the BodyBrush basic kit:

5. For $60 you will get the BodyBrush standard kit:

6. For $90 you will get the BodyBrush complete kit:

7. For $135 you will get everything!



 

 



 
 



8. For $500 you will get 5 of evertyhing




 

 






9. For $1000 you will get 11 of evertyhing




 

 






10. For $2000 you will get 23 of evertyhing and with customizable shower heads (you can add a text or image!)




 

 






 
Shipping
If your perk exceeds $90, you will have FREE shipping costs. In any other case, you will have to pay the shipping costs according to your shipping address and the following region map:


REGION A
 $5      
 
 
 
REGION B
 $11       
 
 
 
REGION C
 $15

 
You must add the appropriate amount to your perk and change it manually before placing it. For example, if you choose the Starter perk ($35) and your shipping address is in region B, you must change the amount to $46.
 
Thank you for contributing!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

VERSIÓN ESPAÑOLA
  
BodyBrush
En BodyBrush nos preocupamos por su bienestar personal y, por ello, hemos desarrollado una gran gama de productos que ayudarán a mejorar su calidad de vida.
Nuestro teléfono de ducha le permitirá realizar diversos tratamientos de belleza corporal al tiempo que toma una revitalizante ducha.
Además, nuestra gama de cremas y aceites complementarán a la perfección el uso del resto de nuestros productos.




 
Teleducha BodyBrush
BodyBrush es un innovador conjunto de teleducha y accesorios (patente en trámites) para la salud corporal, diseñado específicamente para recuperar el esplendor radiante de una piel sana. Con una limpieza con masaje diario de BodyBrush recuperará el brillo en la piel, tonificará su cuerpo y reducirá la celulitis.
El cepillado de la piel elimina la capa vieja y muerta de la epidermis, el sudor y otros productos de desecho corporal que genera el metabolismo humano. Su largo mango le permitirá llegar a aquellas zonas de difícil acceso.



Accesorios
Cepillo


Para sentirse bien y tener un buen aspecto, el cepillado del cuerpo es una parte indispensable del tratamiento. Cepillar el cuerpo como parte de la rutina de limpieza corporal, le permitirá obtener una piel suave y mejorar la higiene corporal al conseguir profundizar más en los poros de la piel.
Un buen cepillado nos permitirá eliminar células de piel muerta así como limpiar los poros obstruidos por el sudor, de esta manera mejoraremos la transpiración de nuestro cuerpo. Para mayor éxito en los resultados, debe realizarse un cepillado en seco previo a la ducha porque esto ayudará a estimular la piel y eliminar descamaciones. Entonces, realizar el cepillado en mojado durante la ducha o baño.

 



Los mayores beneficios se obtienen cepillando el cuerpo en sentido hacia el corazón, formando círculos en sentido horario. Esto activará la circulación sanguínea y estimulará el sistema linfático que es el que se encarga de eliminar los desechos responsables de la celulitis.
Existen diferentes durezas en las cerdas adaptadas a los diferentes tipos de piel. Las pieles sensibles deberán utilizar cerdas suaves y las pieles normales las cerdas de mayor dureza. La piel puede enrojecerse y sentirse un hormigueo a medida que el cepillado corporal aumenta la circulación en áreas de alta concentración de grasas. La presión ejercida deberá depender de la tonificación de piel y cuerpo. Al principio debe cepillarse suavemente. La piel se tonificará rápidamente y pronto se podrá cepillar más vigorosamente y con, si cabe, mejores resultados.
Si más de una persona en la familia practica el cepillado corporal, cada persona debe tener su propio cepillo.
 
Esponja


 
 
 
 

Esta esponja es un accesorio que complementa la higiene diaria de la ducha, permitiendo una mayor profundidad en la limpieza de gérmenes y bacterias en la piel. Este accesorio permite enjabonarse y repartir el jabón o gel BodyBrush de manera uniforme por todo el cuerpo, mientras se aplica agua caliente o fría, según el deseo del usuario.
No debe olvidarse usar el jabón neutro BodyBrush para evitar la piel grasa o seca.


Lo más importante del uso de la esponja es que una vez usada, hay que enjuagarla correctamente, quitándole restos de producto y dejarla secar adecuadamente en un área bien ventilada. A la esponja BodyBrush se le ha hecho un orificio en el centro para permitir que pase completamente el agua, evitando que se queden restos de jabón en el interior, mejorando así la higiene del accesorio.
 
Piedra Pómez Sintética
Las durezas (engrosamiento y endurecimiento de la parte superficial de la piel) en pies, talones, manos y codos son uno de los problemas estéticos que se pueden evitar con los cuidados oportunos.
La aplicación del agua reblandecerá la piel y la preparará para poder frotar, de forma suave, la zona de piel afectada con la piedra pómez sintética BodyBrush. Esta piedra pómez sintética está hecha de vidrio celular y, gracias a esta composición, no absorbe líquidos y las bacterias, hongos y microorganismos no sobreviven en su superficie ni penetran en su interior, evitando posibles infecciones.
Como con el cepillo, existen dos tipos de piedra pómez sintética, dependiendo del tamaño del poro:




 
Esponja exfoliante



El accesorio para exfoliar la piel logrará eliminar las células muertas de las capas superficiales de la dermis, de este modo se evitara que los poros se tapen, obteniendo una piel más limpia y previniendo la celulitis.
Al final de la ducha, después de haber usado jabón o gel BodyBrush para lavar la piel, se masajea el cuerpo entero con movimientos circulares con la esponja exfoliante BodyBrush. Hay que tener cuidado de no frotar demasiado fuerte, ya que se podría dañar la piel.

 



 



Debe prestarse especial atención a las áreas propensas a las durezas, como codos o rodillas, o a las arrugas, como pecho y cuello. Éste es también un buen momento para usar la piedra pómez BodyBrush en los pies, ya que la esponja exfoliante no resolverá el problema. Los dos accesorios se usan en combinación, ya que la piedra pómez BodyBrush es demasiado dura para otras áreas del cuerpo. No debe olvidarse exfoliar las manos, que lo necesitan tanto o más que el resto del cuerpo.
Aplique agua caliente mientras frota la zona de forma circular, esto ayudará a eliminar los restos y a mantener una piel limpia y suave en todo momento. Alternar entre agua fría y caliente ayudará a estimular la circulación sanguínea hacia la piel. Con esto se consigue un agradable estado de relajación.
El uso de este accesorio no es recomendable en bebés ni en pieles dañadas, con heridas o irritadas. No es recomendable realizar la exfoliación más de una vez a la semana.
Al igual que la esponja normal, esta esponja es de poros abiertos, por lo que deja pasar completamente el agua evitando que se queden restos de jabón en el interior y acelerando el proceso de secado, mejorando así la higiene del accesorio.
 
Accesorios anticelulíticos
La celulitis es un problema que afecta al 90% de las mujeres y al 10% de los hombres. Se forma cuando los adipocitos acumulan grasa, agua y toxinas, aumentando el volumen inicial del adipocito dando ese aspecto de piel de "naranja" y evitando que la sangre circule correctamente.
Esta alteración tiene su origen en la complicación de la circulación linfática (encargada de transportar las sustancias de desecho de nuestro cuerpo), debido a diversos factores que pueden ser de tipo hormonal, congénito, alimentario, estilo de vida o psicológico.
Los accesorios anticelulíticos BodyBrush ayudan a tonificar, moldear, conseguir una piel sedosa y reducir los efectos antiestéticos de la piel de "naranja" así como los problemas de retención de líquidos. Junto a chorros alternados de agua fría y caliente se estimula la circulación sanguínea para aportar a la piel los nutrientes necesarios, al mismo tiempo, se desliza con presión el accesorio por aquellas zonas más afectadas para estimular los nodos linfáticos y deshacer los nódulos de celulitis, de tal manera que la grasa acumulada en la superficie se distribuya de forma uniforme para obtener una piel lisa.


 


Consejos: No es recomendable aplicar más de 15 minutos en cada zona. Para combatir la celulitis también es necesario seguir una serie de recomendaciones como seguir una dieta baja en grasas nocivas (carnes, fritos, embutidos, etc...) y rica en verduras y fruta, beber mucha agua, elevar las piernas cuando estemos en reposo y hacer el ejercicio necesario para quemar la grasas extra acumuladas. Este accesorio ayuda a disminuir los efectos de la celulitis pero es necesaria su constancia en tener unos hábitos saludables de forma diaria.
 
Cremas y aceites
En colaboración con Bio Cositas buenas S.L., fabricante de productos de cosmética ecológica certificada, hemos desarrollado una línea de productos que complementa perfectamente nuestra teleducha y accesorios.
Leche corporal


Crema corporal muy agradable de aplicar y de rápida absorción. Deja la piel hidratada con una agradable sensación de suavidad y elasticidad gracias a la combinación de sus ingredientes. Penetra fácilmente. Es apropiada para todo tipo de piel.
Compuesta de aceite de almendra, aceite de aguacate, manteca de karité, hamamelis y centella asiática.

 
 


Aceite de almendra


Proporciona elasticidad a la piel, dejándola hidratada, nutrida y suave. Es muy utilizado como base de masajes solo o con aceites esenciales por sus propiedades emolientes y antiinflamatorias y por su capacidad para suavizar sin obstruir los poros. Lubrica y protege siendo muy adecuado para problemas de irritación y alergias ya que produce efectos calmantes. Previene y repara estrías y arrugas. Es óptimo para aplicar en pieles muy sensibles como la de los bebés.
Con grandes propiedades nutritivas y demulcentes, proporciona a la piel una intensa hidratación, incluso en aquellas pieles más castigadas.

 
 


Bálsamo de Aloe Vera


Procedente de zumo 100% puro de aloe vera de Fuerteventura. El Aloe vera hidrata en profundidad, es un regenerador celular. Rico en ácidos y complejo de vitamina B, que lo hacen único como agente antioxidante, suavizante, revitalizante y regenerante de la piel, por lo que es adecuado para el acné juvenil, irritaciones, quemaduras, picaduras de insectos, exposición solar, depilación, afeitado… Tiene capacidad cicatrizante y tonificante.
Con pepino cultivado en España que refuerza la acción calmante y suavizante de este bálsamo.
También contiene carragenato, una goma proveniente de algas marinas, rica en polisacáridos que ayuda a crear una fina película protectora.

 
 


Manteca de Karité y Rosa Mosqueta


Esta mezcla reúne las propiedades de la manteca de Karité con las de la Rosa Mosqueta. Regenera las capas superficiales de la piel, da firmeza y elasticidad a la piel. Indicada en el tratamiento de pieles secas, envejecidas, irritadas y sensibles. Reduce las estrías y evita su aparición. Protege de las agresiones externas, se recomienda su uso después de la exposición al sol y para las actividades físicas. Se puede usar como mascarilla capilar.

 
 


Mascarilla de arcilla roja


Mascarilla con propiedades hidratantes y purificantes.
La arcilla roja limpia en profundidad eliminando el exceso de grasa y puntos negros sin resecar dejando la piel tonificada. Tiene propiedades astringentes. Es muy cicatrizante ayudando a la regeneración de las células además de tener un efecto antiinflamatorio. Está indicada para pieles sensibles.
Esta mascarilla contiene también acai, ortiga y menta.

 
 


Exfoliante facial


Completo exfoliante que prepara la piel para su posterior hidratación, nutrición y protección.
A base de microgránulos de semilla de albaricoque que producen una exfoliación suave y natural, que activan la circulación facial, liberando a la piel de las células muertas y permitiendo su renovación celular, haciendo que la piel recupere su luminosidad, fortaleciendo la piel y manteniéndola más elástica.
También contiene melisa, malva, caléndula y aloe vera.

 
 


 
Qué necesitamos y qué obtienes
¡Todo lo que necesitamos ahora es tu ayuda! De momento, disponemos de una serie de prototipos totalmente funcionales, obtenidos con moldes temporales. Necesitamos el dinero para conseguir moldes de inyección optimizados para la fabricación del producto y sufragar los costes de manipulación y embalaje.
Beneficios
1. Por $1 aparecerás como donante en nuestra página web
2. Por $5 recibirás un vale de descuento del 5% válido durante un año
3. Por $35 conseguirás un kit inicial de BodyBrush:

4. Por $50 conseguirás un kit básico de BodyBrush:

5. Por $60 conseguirás un kit estándar de BodyBrush:

6. Por $90 conseguirás un kit completo de BodyBrush:

7. Por $135 lo tendrás todo!



 

 



 
 



8. Por $500 conseguirás 5 de todo




 

 






9. Por $1000 conseguirás 11 de todo




 

 






10. Por $2000 conseguirás 23 de todo y con los telefonillos personalizables (¡se puede añadir un texto o imagen!)




 

 






 
Envío
Si tu donativo supera los $90, los gastos de envío serán GRATUITOS. En cualquier otro caso, deberás pagar los gastos de envío según tu dirección de envío y el siguiente mapa zonal:


ZONA A
 $5      
 
 
 
ZONA B
 $11      
 
 
 
ZONA C
 $15

 
Debes añadir la cantidad correspondiente manualmente a tu donación antes de realizarla. Por ejemplo, si eliges el kit inicial (de $35) y tu dirección de envío se encuentra en la zona B, deberás cambiar la cantidad y poner $46.
 
¡¡Gracias por donar!!

story:
Short Summary

THE APPEAL

We are seeking your financial support to help with medical expenses for Keisha Powell.   Keisha was diagnosed with an autoimmune disorder called Myasthenia Gravis.  Myasthenia affects the muscles and the nerves that control them – resulting in weakness in the muscles.  Keisha is currently in the ICU at Kingston Public Hospital (KPH) in Kingston, Jamaica.   She has been on the respirator since May 16, 2012, as she is unable to maintain her respiration because of weakness of her chest wall muscles. 

HER STORY

This is Keisha’s story….She is 34 years old and the mother of two young girls.  She works in the AE/X-Ray department as a Radiology Technician at KPH.  About two years ago, she started having random symptoms. She had tingling in her fingers...she dismissed this as due to the stress of school, raising the girls and everything else going on in her life.   The tingling led to numbness and sometimes a complete loss of feelings in her hand…sometimes she dropped objects.   Numerous trips to the doctor yielded no diagnosis.  She was tired all the time …Still no diagnosis.  Over time other symptoms appeared, double-vision in one eye - but the symptoms were not consistent…they came…they went. 

By mid-2011 another more troubling symptom appeared.  She started having trouble swallowing….it was great for weight-loss because she stopped eating but it was particularly troubling…still no diagnosis.  Her voice changed.  People started to tell her that her voice sounded nasal.  The tiredness, however, stayed with her.  So she went back to her doctor and insisted that something was wrong and something needed to be done.   This doctor referred her to a neurologist, who finally put it all together and tested her for Myasthenia Gravis.  The diagnosis came in February 2012 and she felt “finally …a diagnosis…I can be treated and even if I have to make adjustments I can get on with my girls and life”. 

Keisha started having trouble breathing. It became increasingly difficult for her to work or care for her girls. She was in and out of emergency rooms three times in three weeks until finally she was admitted to the ICU and put on the respirator. Several treatments have been tried but so far none has been successful in helping Keisha.  She now needs a procedure called Plasmapheresis, which is a process in which antibodies are removed from the bloodstream. This procedure is not available in Jamaica. The resources to treat Keisha are not availabe in Jamaica. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

The medical bills have taken a toll on Keisha and her family - hence the need for financial assistance.  Financial donations may be made towards Keisha's growing medical bills and also to get her stabilized care in the United States. It is our prayer that she will get well enough to care for her two young daughters.

Because of the rare nature of this disease in the Caribbean, Keisha's doctor  has recommended she be flown to a hospital in the United States for the care she badly needs. The family is also seeking medical professionals with MG experience to sponsor or assist in finding the right healthcare channels. They have exhausted their resources and cannot do this alone. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT. YOUR ASSISTANCE IS APPRECIATED.

She had tingling in her fingers...she dismissed this as due to the stress of school, raising the girls and everything else going on in her life.   The tingling led to numbness and sometimes a complete loss of feelings in her hand…sometimes she dropped objects.   Numerous trips to the doctor yielded no diagnosis.  She was tired all the time …Still no diagnosis.  Over time other symptoms appeared, double-vision in one eye - but the symptoms were not consistent…they came…they went. 
By mid-2011 another more troubling symptom appeared.  She started having trouble swallowing….it was great for weight-loss because she stopped eating but it was particularly troubling…still no diagnosis.  Her voice changed.  People started to tell her that her voice sounded nasal.  The tiredness, however, stayed with her.  So she went back to her doctor and insisted that something was wrong and something needed to be done.   This doctor referred her to a neurologist, who finally put it all together and tested her for Myasthenia Gravis.  The diagnosis came in February 2012 and she felt “finally …a diagnosis…I can be treated and even if I have to make adjustments I can get on with my girls and life”. 
Keisha started having trouble breathing. It became increasingly difficult for her to work or care for her girls. She was in and out of emergency rooms three times in three weeks until finally she was admitted to the ICU and put on the respirator. Several treatments have been tried but so far none has been successful in helping Keisha.  She now needs a procedure called Plasmapheresis, which is a process in which antibodies are removed from the bloodstream. This procedure is not available in Jamaica. The resources to treat Keisha are not availabe in Jamaica. 
HOW YOU CAN HELP
The medical bills have taken a toll on Keisha and her family - hence the need for financial assistance.  Financial donations may be made towards Keisha's growing medical bills and also to get her stabilized care in the United States. It is our prayer that she will get well enough to care for her two young daughters.
Because of the rare nature of this disease in the Caribbean, Keisha's doctor  has recommended she be flown to a hospital in the United States for the care she badly needs. The family is also seeking medical professionals with MG experience to sponsor or assist in finding the right healthcare channels. They have exhausted their resources and cannot do this alone. 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT. YOUR ASSISTANCE IS APPRECIATED.

story:
Summary

Hi, I'm Lottie. I'm 26 years old and suffer from a rare condition called Klippel Trenaunay Syndrome. 

This page has been set up mainly for the 5x50 challenge team 'Northern Sole' headed by Yvette Wass as their sponsorship page, please below for details! 

UPDATE: DUE TO HAVING THE CHANCE TO PURCHASE A CHEAPER SCOOTER, THE TOTAL REQUIRED HAS GONE FROM £4,000 TO £3,000.  
Klippel Trenaunay Syndrome is a vascular malformation that affects 1 in every 100,000 people and is a result of a mutation in a gene during foetal development. There's no rhyme or reason as to how it occurs, it's just 'one of those things'. 
My condition causes me to bleed internally, yet simultaneously develop DVTs, it causes chronic and acute pain in my right leg, back and abdomen as well as chronic fatigue through my whole body. I have a colostomy because haemangioma took over my bowel and I use a wheelchair most of the time because of joint and vascular pain. The blood doesn't flow around properly, so my veins stretch and dilate which makes my leg feel very heavy and painful. 
I have a wheelchair kindly supplied by the NHS, however, it is painful to use and very heavy. I can't lift it in and out of my car by myself and furthermore, cannot effectively take place in one of my favourite activities; wheelchair dancing. I like to keep active and refuse to be held back. I am a dog trainer and now run my classes from my wheelchair rather than have to give it up.
When I discovered wheelchair dancing, I decided to take it up due to dancing before my condition worsened (gave it up over ten years ago when I could no longer dance through the pain) and missing it greatly. Wheelchair dancing is brilliant and I love it but my large heavy chair just isn't suitable.

I am raising funds to help me buy a lightweight daily use chair that is designed to support me better than the standard chair I currently use so that I won't be in as much pain through the day but it will also be much more suited to dancing so I can partake without pulling my back! 
In addition, my lifeline, my mobility scooter, which I use to get me to local areas where there's no parking, including the hospital, the local shopping area and to take my dogs for walks, has broken down and can't be repaired, so I am also raising funds to replace this and give me my life back! 
Fundraising for myself seems very, very strange and I have been struggling with this, but so far I've had nothing but support from people encouraging me to go for it. Any contribution you can make will mean so much to me, it will be another penny on the way to my independence again. I have always been a very independent person and I don't have someone in my life who can take me places, lift my wheelchair out of the car, take me to the hospital because I don't have my scooter, walk my dogs for me etc. Anybody who helps me towards this can rest assured that each and every contribution means the world to me and I can't even express what it means that people care enough to help. 
5x50 Challenge Team Northern Sole 
The wonderful Yvette Wass and her team Northern Sole, are taking part in the 5x50 challenge (www.5x50.co.uk) and the funds they raise they are kindly donating to my wheelchair fund! The 5x50 challenge consists of 5km of walking, running, cycling or swimming (some form of exercise) every day over 50 consecutive days. That's a pretty decent challenge! They have linked their page to here so if you wish to sponsor them you can do so by adding any amount into the donation - or see the 'perks' section. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • My chair is going to cost £2,500 (I have opted for standard options rather than the more expensive ones - this is not luxury! Just necessity!) and I have managed to find somewhere I can get the scooter I need for £1500, so in total I'm trying to raise £4,000. 
    I will not be looking for any more, but should I end up with over this amount I would ask contributors their thoughts and possibly put it towards a proper dance chair specifically made for dancing (and better than a day chair for this purpose).  
  • I have had some lovely people offer to help including two artists who are selling their artwork. You can buy one of four original artworks from Kim Lintern Art for £100 each, or you can have a painting of your own dog done by Pat Elliott for £100. All information can be found at the website below. 
  • Pat Elliott is not only a talented artist but also a published author and she has offered to donate all of the royalties from her book sales to the fund until the target has been reached. You can find links to her books on the website below. 
  • I sew and make dog collars and leads for my own business (when my pet supplies shop got too much for my health, I moved onto something home based and gentle so I could remain in work) and I am selling some items for animal lovers, some pet accessories and generally anything else you like to put towards the fund. Again, see the website below. 
  • Website: lottieswchairfund.wix.com/lottiewheelchairfund 
  • If I don't raise all of the money on here in the time it allows for, it will be put towards the fund and the fundraising will simply continue in any way I can until I have enough - there isn't an option to fail. 
If, after you've read this, you need to know more before you can consider contributing, please do feel free to get in touch. You can email me at lottieswheelchairfund@mail.com - I aim to be as honest and open with anyone considering helping me as possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Obviously, we are trying to raise funds and so contributions are incredibly gratefully received. I mean, massively! However, I completely understand not everybody can contribute money. 

Please, if you can, tell people about this, I really need the word out there in order to raise this sort of money! Share it wherever you can and you can also share the website mentioned above. 

It says here that I should remind people to use the Indiegogo share tools... so please use the indiegogo share tools!!

Again, see the website below. 
Website: lottieswchairfund.wix.com/lottiewheelchairfund  If I don't raise all of the money on here in the time it allows for, it will be put towards the fund and the fundraising will simply continue in any way I can until I have enough - there isn't an option to fail.

However, I completely understand not everybody can contribute money. Please, if you can, tell people about this, I really need the word out there in order to raise this sort of money! Share it wherever you can and you can also share the website mentioned above. It says here that I should remind people to use the Indiegogo share tools... so please use the indiegogo share tools!!

story:
The Aroma PB - SP Pod Story.

Hi - Brandon and Peter from Aroma PB here!

 

We wanted to make a one use, disposable, aroma producing pod, using natural essential oils, in order to make life and work easier for the professionals in the health and beauty industry, and with that, better for their clients  -  and that’s just what we did!

The Aroma PB - SP or "Smelly Pod" is a one use, disposable, recyclable, aroma producing vessel, specifically developed and formulated for use in hot towel cabinets used extensively in the health and beauty industry.

When the top of the pod is peeled back, and the vessel is placed in a hot towel cabinet, along with the days supply of towels, it emmanates, and permeates into the towels, a beautiful, and healthful 100% natural aromatherapy vapour of the users choice.

We made and distributed some prototype pods to friends and some salons and have found the reaction to be very enthusiastic – most salons, and their clients want to know where to get a pack for daily use!

Why do we need funding?

After spending many hours finding the right partner companies, manufacturing materials, the optimum shape size and design of pod, and different recipes of oils,Aroma PB is now ready to use money raised to acquire and modify the specialist machinery,

to fund, staff, and to establish global distribution for the first production runs.
Very Exciting!

Why Indiegogo?

We think that this product, is a perfect endeavor for the crowd - funding community by making available to the world at large, a beautiful and ecological product for everyone that needs the beneficial effects, and simply enjoys an aromatic hot towel experience, whilst making life, and work, so much  more pleasant for the professionals that look after you in in the health and beauty industry.

Now that we have spent the time and effort finding the right partner companies,for the exacting standards required for production of the Aroma PB - SP, we now need the funds to acquire and house the machinery, purchase the raw materials,, hire, and train production staff, to begin the initial runs of pod manufacture
 

Perks.

Have a look down the side of the page at the perks we are offering, and we think you'll agree they are not only good value, but a fun, and invigorating way to help Aroma PB to begin its entry into the global beauty and health, and wellness industry.

Please note the Very Special $10,000 perk.

If you are looking to establish your very own, Aroma PB sales and distribution business, with a guaranteed exclusive geographical territory, then for $10.000 Aroma PB  will give you all the help  guidance, and marketing tools, plus the exclusive area, and 1000 pods to start your own, potentially VERY profitable Aroma PB - SP supply business, earning around $100,000 per year using our rewarding Aroma PB business model!

Perfect for a young person starting up in business, a professional already in an allied business, for a housewife, as a full or part time business, an active retiree, or if you are just looking for a new career in an ever growing market place, - this is for you!

Please feel free to contact us, and we can discuss everything you will need, and in fact need to know, to set up your partner business with Aroma PB.

 

Aroma PB is looking forward to bringing this ground breaking product to the market with the help we will get from the crowd - funding community.

So come on folks - lets give the globe a far far better, and healthier smell than it has ever had before!
A small donation is all that is required to change the face,(and nose) of the entire health, beauty, and wellness business.

Other Ways You Can Help.

Even if you can't contribute - you can still be instrumental in getting the news out about Aroma PB -SP  using the phenomenon of social media marketing - just email this link to all your friends, family, and anyone you think could benefit from the wonderful pods that we would like to produce.
Maybe they will contribute a few dollars, and take some pods to their own salon, spa, or beauty shop for the stylist or masseuse to try!!
What a great way to introduce Aroma PB - SP's around the world!!!

And don't forget - you get all the help to share the news by using the Indiegogo share tools on this page - what could be simpler!

Thanks

Brandon and Peter
