story:
Who we are:

God's Mountain is a summer camp and retreat conference center in northwest Missouri that is especially unique in one way, we never charge anyone to come to camp, they donate if they are able! We do this because we feel we are called to provide an experience that is available to everyone, no matter what their financial situation! Camp is funded by donations from individuals and churches, and we keep our costs low in every way we can. All of our staff are volunteers and we love what we do!

What we need:

We have had a ongoing amount of construction projects since we have started rebuilding the camp just to meet demand, and funds are always tight. We have had at least 6 consumer grade basketball goals throughout the years and they always are lackluster for competition and break really easily!

We would like to wall mount 2 heavy duty basketball goals that will last indefinitely and get a nice equipment cart. 

***Any money raised beyond our goal will help refinish the gym floor with non-slip material, expand our games and activities such as "9square in the air" "gaga ball" & an outdoor basketball court***

  

The impact:

Around 1000 campers will attend camp this summer, and nearly all of them will play a game in the gym at some point. We want to provide them with a high quality experience that will make them feel like they are special and worthwhile!

 

Ways you can help! 

Even if you are unable to give financially, here are ways you can help.

Spread the word, share this campaign on facebook, twitter, US mail :) however you want! 

In Kind donations. If you have a hookup for some awesome discounts on goals or equipment, or have a guy who knows a guy, call or email us!

story:
Feature articles about

The Cold Shoulder:


GetNews.jp 
(Japanese)


Dr. Wayne B. Hayes is interviewed on ABC News

 

 

Dr. Hayes is interviewed by Australia's leading morning show, Sunrise.


Weight loss via mild cold exposure has been featured in

 


Our Story

I sell a vest full of ice that's designed to burn calories. It is Patent Pending at the United States Patent Office, backed by decades of independent scientific research, has undergone preliminary scientific testing with multiple users, and is currently undergoing two large-scale clinical trials.

I'm a NASA scientist and a professor. What you're about to read is going to sound like science fiction, but it's not. Scientists have spent decades studying how mild cold exposure can enhance calorie burn. Quietly, and without fuss, the evidence for cold exposure induced calorie burn has been accumulating. It's time to bring the science to the public. That's what I'm here to do: to explain to you what is probably the most novel, evidence-based calorie-burning idea that's come out of the scientific community in many years, and to tell you how you can take advantage of it without pain, without discomfort, and without taking more than 2 minutes of time out of your busy day.

Let's be blunt: there is no magic pill for weight loss, and The Cold Shoulder is no exception to that rule. The cold, hard truth is that the foundation of weight control is your diet. In order to maintain a healthy weight, do what grandma told you: eat your veggies, cut the fat off your steak, and avoid junk food, especially sweets. If you continue to eat junk, then no amount of exercise, cold exposure, or weirdly named supplements or powders will help you lose weight. The vest can burn up to a pound of fat per week if used as directed, but you can easily nullify the effect by eating too much junk food. So don't expect that you can continue to eat junk food, wear the vest, and lose weight. You can't.

But if you are already eating well and getting moderate exercise and want to accelerate your calorie-burning efforts by burning excess calories while at rest, there's no simpler, easier, or more time-efficient way than wearing our vest.

We'd like to emphasize exactly under what conditions The Cold Shoulder can induce the burning of excess calories. Basically, you need to be in an environment where you are otherwise at a comfortable temperature, and you are not exercising. If you are sitting down at rest in a room (or your car, or whatever) that is at a comfortable temperature, then wearing The Cold Shoulder directly from the freezer, and with a shirt underneath, will extract heat from your body and cause you to burn extra calories in order to stay warm.

If you are in a hot environment, the The Cold Shoulder will help you stay cool, but it won't burn excess calories, because you're not cold. If you are working out in the gym, then The Cold Shoulder can help you stay cool, but will not enhance your calorie burn, because you're not cold in that environment. If the vest is not cold, or if the ice has all melted, it will not induce excess calorie burn. Remember that the goal of The Cold Shoulder is to force you to burn calories at a time when you otherwise would not: sitting down, at rest, in a comfortable environment at room temperature.

So, to burn excess calories, wear The Cold Shoulder sitting on the couch watching the game, or in front of your computer, or in your car during your commute. Any time you'd normally just be sitting around comfortable---that's the time to don The Cold Shoulder and enhance your calorie burn.

Whether you're an athlete, an actor/model, or a couch potato, almost everybody today could benefit from burning a few more calories without expending time or effort. Note that The Cold Shoulder cannot claim to diagnose, treat, prevent, or cure any disease, illness or condition. All we can claim is that if it's worn as directed, then it's guaranteed to burn excess calories --that part is scientific fact.


The Problem: Exercise is not the only way to burn calories

The first thing I always hear when I say I’m touting a “cold vest” is, “I don’t like being cold.” But think of all the other crazy things people do in order to try to lose excess fat. Starving themselves? Eating zero-calorie clay just to feel full, which carries a risk of arsenic poising? Exhausting themselves in the gym? Ingesting questionable supplements that, if they work at all, have side effects like insomnia or over‐stimulation? How about wearing a corset just to appear thinner? Drug injections? Liposuction? Freezing fat cells? Gastro‐intestinal surgery? Considering these options, wearing a cool, calorie-burning vest is pretty tame in comparison. The Cold Shoulder has no known side effects. Users who start skeptical end up wearing it routinely, and even find they look forward to putting it on at the end of a long day.

There is an aspect of the calorie equation that has been largely neglected for too long. There is a huge hole in our collective knowledge. Although exercise is definitely good, most people think that exercise is theonlyway to burn excess calories. But it's not.


The Solution - Burn excess calories using mild cold exposure

In addition to exercise, there’s another, much less well-known but scientifically well-established way to burn calories. It’s called mild cold exposure. Basically, if you extract heat from your body, even if you’re sitting on your couch in front of the T.V., your body will need to burn calories to stay warm. This is a scientific fact – and I should know, since I work at NASA with a group of scientists that study ice. The trick is to figure out how to harness mild cold exposure without being uncomfortable.

The idea of using mild cold exposure to burn calories has slowly started to percolate into the popular media. Articles on the subject have appeared in many places, including the venues mentioned at the top of this page. The problem is that they often recommend painful or impractical methods of cold exposure, like cold showers or ice baths. Very few people have the courage to try that.

I was studying the science of how cold exposure burns calories, when I had a light-bulb moment. I thought, "If cold exposure burns calories, there’s got to be a way I can harness its power to help ordinary people increase their calorie burn." That’s when I began the work that eventually led me to develop The Cold Shoulder. It's a vest that drapes ice over the shoulder and back, and extracts calories while you wear it. The vest looks like this:

I have put it to the scientific test and proved this vest's efficacy in controlled clinical trials. Here are a few before-and-after shots after just 3 weeks of using The Cold Shoulder:

Considering all the crazy things that people do to burn excess fat, from starvation diets to liposuction, a vest that burns calories while you continue about your day seems pretty tame, don't you think?


Why You’ll Love The Cold Shoulder

1. Burns calories without exercise.Whether you’re a gym rat or a couch potato, our ice vest will burn excess calories for you – the equivalent of up to 500 calories a day. This can more than double the calorie deficit you'd get from dieting alone.

2. Saves time. It takes about 30s to get the vest out of the freezer and put it on. Then you go about your day until the ice melts, and it's another thirty seconds to take it off and put it back into the freezer. Do that twice a day for a week, and you've spent 2 minutes per day to burn a pound of fat. Compare that to the same calories burned in a week of gym workouts, which can consume several hours per day once you include travel time, change room time, and waiting for the machines that are busy when you want to use them. Two minutes vs. two hours, for the same pound of fat.

3. It’s effective.The idea is based on decades of research by scientists from Harvard to Cambridge and beyond. Mild cold exposure burns calories – it’s a scientific fact. The only question is how to do it comfortably, effortlessly.... even fashionably!

4. It’s comfortable. The first time you wear it, yes, it'll feel cold. But you won’t shiver. After trying it a few times, you’ll hardly notice you’re wearing it. Some of our current users actually look forward to putting it on.

5. It gets more effective the more you use it.As your body acclimatizes to periodic mild cold exposure, it gets more used to the idea of turning on your internal furnace to burn calories. It gets easier and easier to burn off more and more calories, just like going to the gym gets easier the more you do it. This is exactly opposite to drugs or supplements, which usually decrease in effectiveness as your body builds a tolerance to them.

6.It’s fashionable. You can wear it pretty much anywhere. I've worn it to fancy French restaurants, as part of a 3-piece suit. I even tried wearing it on my wedding day, but my fiancé – now wife – decided it wasn’t quite ready for that.

7.Sold direct at wholesale prices. Expect to pay significantly more once this is available in retail stores. There’s no middle man. We’ll manufacture your vest and ship it directly to you.


How Does It Work?

The Science Behind Cold-exposure Based Calorie Burn

You don't need to be a scientist to understand that too much cold exposure – such as, say, floating in the North Atlantic after the Titanic sank – can extract so many calories so quickly that it can kill you. On the other hand, mild cold exposure is perfectly healthy, and has been studied by scientists for decades as a way to burn calories.

For example, Olympic swimmers burn many more calories per day than other Olympic athletes, and it has nothing to do with the exercise.It’s the water.They spend their day in water that’s 20 degrees (F) below their body temperature, and this temperature difference makes them burn way more calories than the exercise alone.

Any mild cold exposure causes your body to burn extra calories, whether it’s a cold day outside, air conditioning set too high, or your skin being in contact with a cold object. Scientists have been studying the effects of mild cold exposure for decades, and it’s a well documented fact that mild cold exposure induces calorie burn.

Our vest, The Cold Shoulder, has ice draped over the shoulder and across the back:

These are the most comfortable places to put the ice because that's where your body has the fewest nerve endings. It's also the most scientifically valid place to put the ice because, just under the skin of the shoulders and back, there's a type of tissue called Brown Adipose Tissue(BAT). BAT burns calories when you encounter mild cold. Our clinical trials show that wearing our vest twice a day for about an hour burns up to a pound of fat per week more than you'd burn without it.


Example preliminary trial results

1) Nick Hamilton

Below is a graph of the body fat of Nick Hamilton over a 16-week period. Nick was one of our early testers of The Cold Shoulder. He was on a 16 week, tightly controlled diet and exercise regimen. The only change Nick made in the last 2 weeks was to start using The Cold Shoulder ice vest. You can see how much it accelerated his fat loss.


2) Robert Camille

Here's what Rob had to say after a 2-week trial of The Cold Shoulder:

"My body fat levels have remained stable for about 6 months at around 9% plus minus 0.2%. After 2 weeks wearing The Cold Shoulder it was clear that my body fat percentage reduced by another 0.5%. This does not seem like much, bu given that I started with so little body fat, it is a loss of approximately 5.5% of my total fat in two weeks, which is a significant change in just two weeks.  A loss like this for effectively doing nothing is excellent.  Furthermore my body fat percentage has reached a new low than ever previously – and I believe my trial clearly shows that it was a result of The Cold Shoulder.

Back to what I mentioned earlier about my weight remaining unchanged – my best conclusion is that whatever weight was lost in fat, I have gained approximately in muscle. I have no proof or statics of this but it makes sense and also agrees with the cold exposure studies.

The Cold Shoulder is a high quality product that I would definitely recommend to anyone wanting that extra edge in toning up and reducing body fat percentage. It is comfortable and easy to use, and has definitely produced results for me with effectively zero effort!"


3) Kyle Timblin


Kyle did a different kind of test.  He was just heading into the Holidays when he started using The Cold Shoulder, and rather than trying to lose fat, his goal was to avoiding gaining fat over the Holidays.  Here's his experience:
"Thanks to The Cold Shoulder, I was able to eat 6,000 more calories over two weeks over the Holidays, without any weight gain. It is great to be able to indulge a bit without losing precious progress."


4) Mike Smith

"I lost 1.5 pounds in 2 weeks wearing The Cold Shoulder.  In addition to that, my second favorite benefit was that my sleep improved. I wore it for just a few minutes before bed each night and slept much more soundly than I had done for months."
(Note that Mike's weight loss was a bit less than other users --- less than the quoted pound per week --- because he didn't wear it for the full recommended 60-90 minutes in the evening.)


Evidence from independent scientists

For more info on cold exposure and calorie burn, see this page. Note that some of it is rather technical---definitely not light reading. But if you want some of the cold, hard scientific facts from independent researchers, this is the place to start. Most of the research was done even before I conceived of The Cold Shoulder, so you know it's independent and objective.


Our Mission

We want to bring the most functional, comfortable, honest, and stylish clothing-based calorie-burning aid to the global market. We want to spread the word that burning calories doesn’t have to require time-consuming gym visits, sweaty exercise, crazy calorie-restricted diet fads, or taking untested, questionable supplements with unknown side effects. Instead, we advocate that a healthy lifestyle must contain not only a healthy diet and moderate exercise, but also a regular dose of mild cold exposure.


Our Book

One of our perks is an electronic copy of our new book, The Cold War on Fat. It contains tons of science about cold exposure-based weight loss, as well as tons of other scientifically-based information about weight loss.



Will The Cold Shoulder Fat Burning Vest fit me?

We have sizes to fit everybody from XS to XXX-L. We’ll get your sizing option after the funding period is over.

The Details


Our Guarantee

We are confident that you will be happy with your vests and the results it will produce, but if for any reason you’re not completely satisfied, just send it back (you pay shipping, and please give us a “heads up” first), and we'll repair or replace your vest and ship it back to you free of charge.


TESTIMONIALS

“The Cold Shoulder allowed me to cut body fat while still gaining Lean Body Mass. It’s easy to use and makes experimenting with cold exposure simple.”– Nick Hamilton

“After just 2 weeks wearing The Cold Shoulder, I lost approximately 5.5% of my body fat. A loss like this for effectively doing nothing is excellent.”– Robert Camille

“In addition to the extra 1.5 lbs I lost using The Cold Shoulder, my second favorite benefit was that my sleep improved. I wore it for a few minutes before bed every night and slept much more soundly than I had done for months.”– Mike Smith.

“Thanks to The Cold Shoulder, I was able to eat 6000 more calories over two weeks while having friends and family visit without any weight gain. It is great to be able to indulge a bit without losing precious progress.”– Kyle Timblin

“I lost 5 lbs and an inch off my torso in just 3 weeks using The Cold Shoulder. I wore it only once or twice a day, and it was cool and comfortable.” - Jocelyn Hayes

“I lost 15 lbs. in 3 weeks. I lost much of my stomach flab and it was easy to use!” - Anthony Peters


THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

We'd be so grateful if you would help us share this campaign via email, FB, and twitter!

Feature articles about
The Cold Shoulder:







































 GetNews.jp 



 (Japanese)





 


Dr. Wayne B. Hayes is interviewed on ABC News

 

 
Dr. Hayes is interviewed by Australia's leading morning show, Sunrise.


Weight loss via mild cold exposure has been featured in

  


Our Story

I sell a vest full of ice that's designed to burn calories. It is Patent Pending at the United States Patent Office, backed by decades of independent scientific research, has undergone preliminary scientific testing with multiple users, and is currently undergoing two large-scale clinical trials.
I'm a NASA scientist and a professor. What you're about to read is going to sound like science fiction, but it's not. Scientists have spent decades studying how mild cold exposure can enhance calorie burn. Quietly, and without fuss, the evidence for cold exposure induced calorie burn has been accumulating. It's time to bring the science to the public. That's what I'm here to do: to explain to you what is probably the most novel, evidence-based calorie-burning idea that's come out of the scientific community in many years, and to tell you how you can take advantage of it without pain, without discomfort, and without taking more than 2 minutes of time out of your busy day.
Let's be blunt: there is no magic pill for weight loss, and The Cold Shoulder is no exception to that rule. The cold, hard truth is that the foundation of weight control is your diet. In order to maintain a healthy weight, do what grandma told you: eat your veggies, cut the fat off your steak, and avoid junk food, especially sweets. If you continue to eat junk, then no amount of exercise, cold exposure, or weirdly named supplements or powders will help you lose weight. The vest can burn up to a pound of fat per week if used as directed, but you can easily nullify the effect by eating too much junk food. So don't expect that you can continue to eat junk food, wear the vest, and lose weight. You can't.
But if you are already eating well and getting moderate exercise and want to accelerate your calorie-burning efforts by burning excess calories while at rest, there's no simpler, easier, or more time-efficient way than wearing our vest.
We'd like to emphasize exactly under what conditions The Cold Shoulder can induce the burning of excess calories. Basically, you need to be in an environment where you are otherwise at a comfortable temperature, and you are not exercising. If you are sitting down at rest in a room (or your car, or whatever) that is at a comfortable temperature, then wearing The Cold Shoulder directly from the freezer, and with a shirt underneath, will extract heat from your body and cause you to burn extra calories in order to stay warm.
If you are in a hot environment, the The Cold Shoulder will help you stay cool, but it won't burn excess calories, because you're not cold. If you are working out in the gym, then The Cold Shoulder can help you stay cool, but will not enhance your calorie burn, because you're not cold in that environment. If the vest is not cold, or if the ice has all melted, it will not induce excess calorie burn. Remember that the goal of The Cold Shoulder is to force you to burn calories at a time when you otherwise would not: sitting down, at rest, in a comfortable environment at room temperature.
So, to burn excess calories, wear The Cold Shoulder sitting on the couch watching the game, or in front of your computer, or in your car during your commute. Any time you'd normally just be sitting around comfortable---that's the time to don The Cold Shoulder and enhance your calorie burn.
Whether you're an athlete, an actor/model, or a couch potato, almost everybody today could benefit from burning a few more calories without expending time or effort. Note that The Cold Shoulder cannot claim to diagnose, treat, prevent, or cure any disease, illness or condition. All we can claim is that if it's worn as directed, then it's guaranteed to burn excess calories --that part is scientific fact.

The Problem: Exercise is not the only way to burn calories
The first thing I always hear when I say I’m touting a “cold vest” is, “I don’t like being cold.” But think of all the other crazy things people do in order to try to lose excess fat. Starving themselves? Eating zero-calorie clay just to feel full, which carries a risk of arsenic poising? Exhausting themselves in the gym? Ingesting questionable supplements that, if they work at all, have side effects like insomnia or over‐stimulation? How about wearing a corset just to appear thinner? Drug injections? Liposuction? Freezing fat cells? Gastro‐intestinal surgery? Considering these options, wearing a cool, calorie-burning vest is pretty tame in comparison. The Cold Shoulder has no known side effects. Users who start skeptical end up wearing it routinely, and even find they look forward to putting it on at the end of a long day.
There is an aspect of the calorie equation that has been largely neglected for too long. There is a huge hole in our collective knowledge. Although exercise is definitely good, most people think that exercise is theonlyway to burn excess calories. But it's not.

The Solution - Burn excess calories using mild cold exposure
In addition to exercise, there’s another, much less well-known but scientifically well-established way to burn calories. It’s called mild cold exposure. Basically, if you extract heat from your body, even if you’re sitting on your couch in front of the T.V., your body will need to burn calories to stay warm. This is a scientific fact – and I should know, since I work at NASA with a group of scientists that study ice. The trick is to figure out how to harness mild cold exposure without being uncomfortable.
The idea of using mild cold exposure to burn calories has slowly started to percolate into the popular media. Articles on the subject have appeared in many places, including the venues mentioned at the top of this page. The problem is that they often recommend painful or impractical methods of cold exposure, like cold showers or ice baths. Very few people have the courage to try that.
I was studying the science of how cold exposure burns calories, when I had a light-bulb moment. I thought, "If cold exposure burns calories, there’s got to be a way I can harness its power to help ordinary people increase their calorie burn." That’s when I began the work that eventually led me to develop The Cold Shoulder. It's a vest that drapes ice over the shoulder and back, and extracts calories while you wear it. The vest looks like this:


The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest

I have put it to the scientific test and proved this vest's efficacy in controlled clinical trials. Here are a few before-and-after shots after just 3 weeks of using The Cold Shoulder:



Anthony Peters (above) accelerated his tummy loss using The Cold Shoulder





Results of 3 weeks of wearing The Cold Shoulder

Considering all the crazy things that people do to burn excess fat, from starvation diets to liposuction, a vest that burns calories while you continue about your day seems pretty tame, don't you think?

Why You’ll Love The Cold Shoulder
1. Burns calories without exercise.Whether you’re a gym rat or a couch potato, our ice vest will burn excess calories for you – the equivalent of up to 500 calories a day. This can more than double the calorie deficit you'd get from dieting alone.
2. Saves time. It takes about 30s to get the vest out of the freezer and put it on. Then you go about your day until the ice melts, and it's another thirty seconds to take it off and put it back into the freezer. Do that twice a day for a week, and you've spent 2 minutes per day to burn a pound of fat. Compare that to the same calories burned in a week of gym workouts, which can consume several hours per day once you include travel time, change room time, and waiting for the machines that are busy when you want to use them. Two minutes vs. two hours, for the same pound of fat.
3. It’s effective.The idea is based on decades of research by scientists from Harvard to Cambridge and beyond. Mild cold exposure burns calories – it’s a scientific fact. The only question is how to do it comfortably, effortlessly.... even fashionably!
4. It’s comfortable. The first time you wear it, yes, it'll feel cold. But you won’t shiver. After trying it a few times, you’ll hardly notice you’re wearing it. Some of our current users actually look forward to putting it on.
5. It gets more effective the more you use it.As your body acclimatizes to periodic mild cold exposure, it gets more used to the idea of turning on your internal furnace to burn calories. It gets easier and easier to burn off more and more calories, just like going to the gym gets easier the more you do it. This is exactly opposite to drugs or supplements, which usually decrease in effectiveness as your body builds a tolerance to them.
6.It’s fashionable. You can wear it pretty much anywhere. I've worn it to fancy French restaurants, as part of a 3-piece suit. I even tried wearing it on my wedding day, but my fiancé – now wife – decided it wasn’t quite ready for that.
7.Sold direct at wholesale prices. Expect to pay significantly more once this is available in retail stores. There’s no middle man. We’ll manufacture your vest and ship it directly to you.

Due to the temperature difference between the body and the water, heat flows from the body to the water, burning many more calories than the exercise alone.

Any mild cold exposure causes your body to burn extra calories, whether it’s a cold day outside, air conditioning set too high, or your skin being in contact with a cold object.  Scientists have been studying the effects of mild cold exposure for decades, and it’s a well documented fact that mild cold exposure induces calorie burn.

story:
Honestly, I have never asked anyone for money before and I don‘t feel comfortable about it, but to get my dad‘s dream come true, I am willing to do so and am hereby asking you kindly for your help and support.

My dad had a light stroke 6 months ago and the doctors found on top of that a brain tumour as well. He struggles with his short term memories, he can‘t read & write and is not allowed to drive anymore. My family and our doctor decided NOT to tell him about the tumour. He is still trying really hard to learn to read/write again but it‘s not getting any better. We didn‘t tell him because our doctor said that people are more likely to lose their will to live & learn after being informed that they have an incurable brain tumor

He keeps telling me how great it would be to spend some time on a proper farm in the United States, including feeding animals, cleaning barns etc. .. He cannot remember much about his past but what he remembers (in such detail) are all the memories that are linked to his life as a farmer before he retired (he sold the farm 10 years ago). For example, he still knows the brand name of his tractors, important dates such as harvest times/ deadlines for deliveries and how much time he would need to plough the land. It‘s nice listen to him when he talks about such things, because he does that always with a smile on his face.

So my idea is, to send my dad and mum for a few months to a proper US farm with lots of animals, land and machines. I found some nice places in the South where they offer accommodations on a farm where the visitors are also involved in the daily work. I am sure that my dad would be very happy if we send him over and the linguistics therapist we had also likes the idea because it would stimulate his memory training, makes him feel like home etc. ...

I would very much appreciate your support, thanks so much in advance for your donation and lets bring the old man back on a farm!

story:
About Me

I am an Eagle Scout. This is not my Eagle Scout project; I already completed it.  I am doing this project just to benefit the camp.  I am coordinating a project to build a new Gaga Ball Pit at Camp Sequassen in New Hartford, CT. This camp is owned by Connecticut Yankee Council in Milford, CT.  It is a non-profit organization.

The current Gaga Ball Pit was funded by a donation and build by Scouts. At summer camp, the pit is constantly in use. There is need for a second pit. 

What is Gaga Ball?

According to Wikipedia (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ga-ga), Ga-ga is Hebrew for touch-touch. It is a form of dodge ball played in an enclosed area with one ball. It combines dodging, striking, running and jumping. The object is to hit opponents below the knee before getting hit yourself. It is a fun, fast-paced game that gives boys great exercise.

What will the Money be used for?

The money will be used to purchase the hardware kit, pressure-treated lumber, base gravel, and rubberized surface. Here is the website of the company I plan to purchase the kit from: http://www.gagaballpits.com/     It is very durable and professional-looking.

Any additional money raised will be given to the camp for other projects. 

Construction will be supervised by the camp ranger, and will be done completely by volunteer scouts.

How much of Your Donation Goes to the Project?

If I meet my goal, then 96% will go directly to the project.  Indiegogo takes 4%. Because it is a non-profit, I expect the fees to be less than four percent.  Some credit cards and PayPal charge a fee around 3-5%.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand some people can't contribute, but you can help me by spreading the word.

story:
We are Indian Indoor Cricket team under Indian Indoor Sports Foundation (IISF), affiliated to World Indoor Cricket federation (WICF).

Background :
We have taken part in three international tournaments since 2011.
1) 2011 INDOOR CRICKET WORLDCUP in JOHANESSBURG, SOUTH AFRICA.
2) 2nd international series in Bangalore, India (feb 2013) - in which we won the bilateral series against Srilanka 4-1.
3) Triseries between India-Australia-Srilanka in Colombo,Srilanka (oct 2013)

About our campaign 
This campaign is due to the sponsorship issues which went horribly wrong in the last couple of days and we have fallen short of funds. We dont have many days to find sponsorship. Inspite of best 12 being selected from India, due to sponsorship issues they are in no position to confirm our entry for the worldcup. Its really important for us to take part in the worldcup as its a major tournament for all of us, and we have been working hard towards this since couple of months and all of us have sacrificed so many things in the last 3 years. Missing a major tournament like this after so much trouble and hard work would be very dissappointing. PLEASE CONTRIBUTE!!! We will give our best and try to bring glory to the nation.

Funding we need and what you get
estimated costs of sending a team to Wellington, Newzealand to be approximately NZD 50,000 for a team of 12 players and 3 officials. These costs cover the following :
1) Team Entry Fees : Rs 2,85,000 = 4693 USD
2) Flight and visa costs : Rs 14,25,000 = 23465 USD
3) Team Kit : Rs 1,50,000 = 2470 USD
4) Accomodation, Food and local conveyance : Rs 7,40,000 = 12185 USD

Perks are mentioned in the following page. More you contribute more valuables you get in return.
If we dont reach our entire goal the amount what we get here will be divided amongst the teammates and the rest will be made through bits and pieces sponsorship what we are getting here. That will help us in raising the full amount and hence to take part in the worldcup.

The impact we have already made in the world stage (previous worldcup and last few series) and the hunger to continue doing well for the nation in such a beautiful sport which is gaining popularity in india.
Since its a growing sport in india and gaining popularity, and as we have done really well in our first 3 international tournaments, its time people realize the importance of this sport in india and support us to take part in the mega event i.e the worldcup which each youngster would dream of and not curb after so much of hard work we have put in all these years.

Achievements
1) Our first international tournament was the 2011 worldcup in South Africa, where india were expected to be beaten against all other test playing nations but against all odds, with the heroics we created history by defeating England and Srilanka.That was a huge feat.
2) Defeated Srilanka comprehensively (4-1)in the 2nd international tournament for india in the bilateral series in India (feb 2013).

Challenges 
Since the first tournament we have faced so many challenges. Playing against world champions Australia or be any other test playing nation isn't easy. Against all odds, with never say die attitude we have played some good cricket and won so many hearts and in such short time creating history by winning and improving and letting this sport grow to such an extent that people realize that he represents his nation in this sport is itself a big achievement. And we are all dreaming big. Hope this dream comes true and we are ready to face yet another huge challenge.

Other ways you can help
Contribute!!  or if u cant pleaseee spread the word and ask others to do so.
It will help fulfill our dreams. Please do support!
2014 WORLDCUP SCHEDULE

story:
Short Summary

  • Sage Anxiety Treatment Program opened in 2011 and has enjoyed continuous growth.  More importantly, we've experienced the joy that comes with helping people regain their lives and do the things that bring vitality and value. Our program is a leader in being the first Intensive Program in the nation to integrate two evidence-based therapies - Acceptance and Commitment Therapy and Exposure and Response Prevention. 
  • People suffering from moderate to severe Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder or other anxiety-related disorders such as social anxiety or hair pulling spend between 9 and 15 hours per week in our program.  Imagine the depth of suffering that would lead to such a commitment.
  • Sage accepts insurance and it's become apparent over the past year that insurance providers are authorizing fewer and fewer sessions.  Clients who need continued treatment in order to lead a functional life are being denied authorizations.  It absolutely makes our hearts ache.
  • We have always provided pro bono for at least one client at any one time.  It has taken the form of either providing a full course of treatment at no charge or allowing a current client to continue in the program at no charge after their insurance has stopped authorizing sessions. Very few people can afford to continue out of pocket. Our mission is to help people, not to become wealthy.  
  • Unfortunately, insurance companies requirements have resulted in a large increase in overhead without an increase in reimbursement to us.  The result has been the cessation of pro bono services.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for contributors to sponsor continued treatment once insurance has denied further care.  Often, we know that even 10 more 3-hour sessions could make the difference between being more functional but always plagued by OCD and being vital and fully functioning.
  • You may contribute at any amount.  It certainly doesn't have to be $375, but as a benchmark, one 3-hour session could be covered by $375.
  • Your contribution will have a direct and profound effect on a person's life and the lives of their loved ones.  OCD is a biologically based disorder and is almost always chronic with functioning deteriorating over time.  
  • Donations of less than $375 will be combined to provide one session.  Any amount is appreciated.
  • One of the perks we offer is a Mindfulness Meditation CD by Jon Kabat-Zinn.  He is an amazing teacher and you can experience first-hand the benefits of meditation.  We teach meditation to clients to help them experience the difficult physical sensations of anxiety, disengage from their painful thoughts and live in the present moment. 
  • Contributors will receive a shout-out on our Facebook Page, a listing on our website and a thank you card from the owner and director and, at higher levels of donation, the meditation CD and meditation cushion.  Due to confidentiality, we will not be able to disclose the name of the client whose life you helped to change.

The Impact

Our program is unique.  The traditional "exposure" treatment for OCD is helpful, but 20% of the people who hear about it decline treatment and 30% of the people who begin treatment drop out early.  At Sage, we have a 7.7% early drop out rate.  

One of the reasons it's so successful is that we take the time to give people a foundation in mindfulness-based Acceptance and Commitment Therapy.  We are teaching them an entirely new way to approach their anxiety.  There is such excitement about the changes this produces in people's lives - certainly with respect to anxiety but also with the experience of other difficult emotions. 

Risks & Challenges

We have faced and overcome at least most of the challenges that have been presented in the first three years of business. We value client care and our rates are very reasonable which means a slim profit margin.  With the changes in overhead, the real risk is that we will not be able to provide continuing care for people who cannot afford to pay for treatment.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Contributing money isn't the only way to help and we appreciate any and all efforts. 

  •  Use the Indiegogo share tools to share this with people you know.
  • Share it on your Facebook, Twitter and other social media

story:
Thank You Everyone! The campaign has ended and we reached $130,425. We couldn't do this without your support and contribution.

For those who still want to place a pre-order, Fret Not! You can place your pre-order through our website, www.vibease.com



We are happy to announce that Vibease Vibrator is now 100% funded. We want to thank all funders and supporters that believe in our product as well as in our team. Your vibrator is on its way! As a token of appreciation, we are now ready to launch some awesome stretch goals.






So, we need an extra effort from all of you: Share out our Vibease Vibrator campaign to all your friends. Your little help will bring us all the way to the 150k goal!






 

Specs | Fantasy | Long Distance | Testimonial | Videos  | Team  | FAQ

Vibease®: The world's first wearable smart vibrator brings your fantasies to life

Vibease is the world's first wearable smart vibrator. Over the past two years, Vibease has been working extensively to develop a vibrator that can create a truly immersive sexual experience, to incite all your senses.

We designed our product with female sexuality wellness in mind. After speaking to women and intimacy experts, we understand that physical stimulation alone is not enough. Many vibrators out there are just focusing on the vibration strength.

People often forget that the brain is the biggest sex organ. Research shows hearing, mood, emotion and fantasies play a big part in a woman's sexual pleasure and satisfaction. We've created a product using revolutionary technology to tap into how women are designed to best experience pleasure. The result is nothing short of extraordinary.

 

We're on the NEWS:

What women say about Vibease

The wearable vibrator + fantasies combo you've always wanted!
Cindy Gallop, founder of MakeLoveNotPorn

I am so excited and can’t wait to try this product out! We as women have been waiting for something revolutionary to be created that would allow for such amazing pleasure, alone or with a lover and your product looks exactly like what we’ve been waiting for!
Jamie L

We love to see a company taking a woman's pleasure seriously. It's a passionate team championing smart and thoughtful design and we couldn't be happier to see them do well.We can't wait to try out the Vibease and Fantasy app this fall and clearly, we're in good company now.
Unboundbox, an intimate revolution

The fact that women notoriously get turned on by reading should be a connection people made a long time ago, but perhaps it also has to do with the avoidance of women's sexuality? Regardless, I think it's awesome you are all following through and making your vision and advancements in technology become a reality.
D L

The long-distance relationship you always wanted
Jordan Crook, TechCrunch

Shut up and take my money
Amanda Williams, Fabule founder

Technology and pleasure, love it!
Melanie M

This could be taking long distance relationships to the next level :)
Amruta M

back to top

The Vibease Vibrator: Excitement + Anticipation

Fifty Shades of Grey sold millions of copies all over the world because it stimulated the mind. Now imagine listening to Fifty Shades of Grey with a hands free vibrator that works in perfect sync with the audio fantasy. The experience will have your toes curling. Vibease brings your fantasy to life, creating a multi-sensory experience. Your pleasure doesn't need to be solely imaginative anymore. It truly is an exciting new experience, full of anticipation. It's not about the end result. It's about the journey. The Vibease lets you enjoy every second of the journey all the way up until the exciting intense "conclusion".

 

The Vibease: Immersive pleasure experience

By combining a Bluetooth-enabled vibrator with iOS and Android apps, Vibease vibrator vibrates in sync with audio fantasy.

With the Fantasy App, you can select one of the audio fantasies from the list to set you in the mood. You don't have to hold the vibrator (or your smartphone). You can relax and totally enjoy the moment. No user control is needed from this point onward. You are free to completely immerse into the fantasy and experience pleasure at a level you never thought possible.

The Vibease and Fantasy app work like this: When the voice in the fantasy app says: "I'm touching you softly", the vibrator vibrates softly. And when the voice says: "I'm touching you hard", the vibrator vibrates hard. The vibrator reacts to the story within the Fantasy. The vibrations are personalized to each Fantasy, and it gives vibrations with different intensities and various patterns at just the right moments.

It's like the perfect partner that knows how to touch you at the right moment in the right way.

In the future we will also use binaural audio (3D audio) to make it even more real. Binaural audio gives sensation for the listener of actually being in the room with the performers. You can feel as if the person is beside you.

 

back to top

Fantasy Library: Harnessing the power of the spoken word

Fantasies are natural and positive elements of a woman's sexuality. Women who fantasize show higher rates of satisfaction. Women's fantasies tend to be less graphic and more emotional and intimate than men's. That's why we created a library of audio stories that will usher you away into an exciting world of fantasy. We provide a comprehensive library for you to find a fantasy that suits your mood. Each Fantasy contains audio and non-explicit images. It does not contain any video.

 

Create Your Own Customized Fantasies

If you can't find any fantasies that suit your mood. The Fantasy App allows you to record your partner's voice and insert the varying levels of vibration to coincide with the audio content. The vibrations are fully customizable. Once you finish recording, you can replay it whenever you want to. Creating your own customized fantasies with your partner is fun, exciting and will surely add to the physical and emotional richness of your relationship.

You can even upload your own personal fantasy to the Fantasy Library and let other people listen to your fantasy.

Long Distance Intimacy

With the Vibease Intimate App, long distance relationships just might become people's preference. The Vibease Intimate app allows your partner to control the vibrations from anywhere in the world. It doesn't matter if your partner is in the office or in another country, you can still have your intimate moments. Distance doesn't matter.

The app has a private messaging system for you to share intimate conversations. And most importantly, your partner can create special moves and vibrations to give you a pleasant surprise.

If you're in a long distance relationship, you definitely need to have the Vibease Intimate App. 

back to top

 

Vibrator design and specifications

We carefully designed the Vibease Smart Vibrator with modern women in mind. We wanted to make something both discreet and beautiful. The Vibease Smart Vibrator is designed for clitoral stimulation. Statistics indicate that 80 percent of women require clitoral stimulation to attain orgasm.

Vibease vibrator is small, measuring only 3.1 inches long. Good things really do come in small packages :) It is made from 100% body-safe silicone for a soft and comfortable feeling. Other features of the Vibease Smart Vibrator include:

  • Compatible with most Android phones and latest iPhones.
  • Strong vibrations with customizable pulsations to provide as realistic an experience as possible.
  • Rechargeable battery lasting up to three hours. The battery can be charged through USB.
  • Waterproof and easy to clean.
  • Can be used as a standalone vibrator in case you don't have your smartphone.
  • Communicates with your smartphone via Bluetooth connectivity. Bluetooth 2.1 for the Android app and Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) for the iPhone app.

back to top

 

Wearable

Making the vibrator small, discreet and wearable is the one of the top requests we received from women for numerous reasons:

  • Mandatory for complete immersive experience. You can relax and enjoy your moment.
  • A total hands-free experience and your fingers will not get tired.
  • Discreet. No one will know that you're having a good time.

We spent much time designing a comfortable, wearable vibrator. We wanted to create something easy to use, allowing women to slip it inside the undergarment whenever they wanted. After many different designs we found the solution by redesigning the tip. The tip is specially designed to make it easy for women to locate the sweet spot while ensuring the vibrator remains steadily in place. We do not recommend wearing the Vibease vibrator during outdoor activities.



Vibease Apps

We are currently finishing development of two Vibease apps: Vibease Fantasy and Vibease Intimate. It will be available in both Android and iPhone versions. We will release the app in September before we ship the vibrators. The apps will be free to all Vibease customers. During the process we will invite our early backers to test our apps and provide valuable feedback. Currently we have a beta app for Android. 

back to top


This is just the beginning. We have more exciting apps in the pipe line. Our research and development team is working hard to design and create more exciting Vibease apps that will enrich you and your partner's lives and relationship.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product on a large scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development. Not all electronics manufacturers created equal. Every manufacturer has their own expertise, because every product has its own manufacturing challenges. The quality of our product was of paramount concern. We will not deliver a mediocre product. The devil is in the details, which is why selecting the right manufacturing partner was a top priority.

Successful business organizations surround themselves with experts. After vetting several candidates, we partnered with one of the biggest sex toy manufacturers in China to ensure the Vibease would meet our high manufacturing standards in terms of safety, quality and reliability. We've been working with our manufacturing partners for the past few months, perfecting the product to make it ready for mass production. They have manufactured high-quality vibrators for some of the most famous sex toy brands in the US and Europe. By working with experienced sex toy manufacturers, we have reduced the hardware-related challenges significantly, and avoided costly mistakes.

However, there is always the risk of unexpected circumstances delaying our delivery. We assure you that we will work hard to mitigate those risks. We plan to be 100% transparent throughout the delivery process.

back to top

 

MEET THE TEAM 

back to top

THANK YOU FOR BELIEVING IN US!

We'd like to thank everyone who has helped us out along the way.

HAXLR8R's guidance on how to build this kickass product and navigate the challenge of finding the most suitable manufacturing partner was invaluable. Thank you to all the mentors.

Fellow HAXLR8R startups, it has been so much fun to work together and brainstorm with other hardware founders and hackers. The atmosphere was charged with positive energy. Spark, Yee Link, BlinkiVerse, Helios Bars, Fabule, Lightup, Hex Air Robot, and Molecule Synth – thank you for your support. We also want to thank Nomiku, Gtar, and Lightup. Thank you to all the girls Vanessa, Amanda, Silvia and Qi Yu. Thank you Joyce from Microsoft BizSpark & Windows Azure.

Thank you Selena Sol, for believing us since the beginning and your advice. 

Thank you Cindy Gallop, founder of MakeLoveNotPorn, for being the inspiration on how to change the world through sexuality. Words cannot express our gratitude!

Thank you Founder Institute and FI big family for being supportive since the beginning.

Thank you to all writers who featured Vibease. We are extremely humbled by the opportunity.

THANK YOU to all our users and supporters who want to be remained anonymous. You know who you are. It's all possible because of you. Thank you for all your feedback.

Last but Not Least, You! THANK YOU for your time. Please support our project and help us to spread the news. Every bits count!

back to top

FAQ:

Which version should I get, iPhone or Android?

For long distance intimacy, this can be confusing. Get the vibrator based on the smartphone she is using. If she's using Android phone, get Vibease (Android), if she's using iPhone, get Vibease (iPhone). To control from long distance, you can use both iPhone and Android.

Does Vibease support Windows phone and Blackberry?

Due to limited resources, at this moment, we don't have a plan to develop app for Windows phone and Blackberry. As we're focusing to deliver the vibrators :) If there is a demand, we will look into it after we shipped the first batch of vibrators.

Do we ship Internationally and what are the shipping costs?

All shipping in the US is free of charge. Estimated shipping cost to Canada is $10 and an estimated $15 for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. International shipping fee varies due to diffrent import policies in every country. We will inform you if the shippping fee exceeds the estimated cost. At this moment, we can't confirm the shipping fee for every country until we have a complete picture of the international market. We also need to wait until we have the final packaging. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will do a full refund.

Does Vibease work with all Android phones?

Vibease works with Android phones with version 2.3 and onwards that have Bluetooth built-in. Technically, it can work with all Android 2.3 with Bluetooth, but we have realized that there is a chance where certain models might not work with Vibease due to the huge varieties of Android phones.

Does Vibease work with Android Tablets?

No, it doesn't work on Android Tablets. Email us and we will keep you posted when it can run on Android tablets.

Does Vibease work with all iPhones, iPods and iPads?

We are using Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) for the vibrator. For connecting the Vibease vibrator to iOS device, it ONLY works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 and later, iPod Touch 5th Generation and later. iPad (3rd gen & 4th Gen), and iPad Mini. However, all iOS devices with Internet connectivity will be able to connect to another smartphone remotely, and control the vibrator that is attached to that smartphone.

What is the maximum distance that Bluetooth can control the vibrator at?

The Vibrator works within 10 feets from the smartphone. For long-distance remote control, the connection is made through internet between the two phones. For instance, Amy in San Francisco connects to her vibrator using BLuetooth. For John who is in New York to control Amy's vibrator, he has to setup a connection to Amy's phone over the internet through the Intimate app. As long as both phones have internet, distance doesn't matter.

Do you need the phone to be same models in order for the long distance to work?

No. Android devices can connect with iOS devices. Digital love is blind after all.

What will appear on your credit card bill for your purchase?

Vibease purchase transaction will appear on your credit card bill as "VPL".

How to contribute anonymously?

You can choose whether or not you want your name and contribution amount to be displayed on the campaign page under the 'Contributors' tab. Choose 'Visible' if you want both your name and amount displayed, 'Identity-Only' if you want only your name displayed without your amount, and 'Anonymous' if you want only your amount displayed. Learn More

Still have questions?

No worries. Email us at info [at] vibease [dot] com. We will be more than happy to assist you.

back to top

Vibease® is a registered trademark in the U.S. and other countries.

And when the voice says: "I'm touching you hard", the vibrator vibrates hard. The vibrator reacts to the story within the Fantasy. The vibrations are personalized to each Fantasy, and it gives vibrations with different intensities and various patterns at just the right moments.
It's like the perfect partner that knows how to touch you at the right moment in the right way.
In the future we will also use binaural audio (3D audio) to make it even more real. Binaural audio gives sensation for the listener of actually being in the room with the performers. You can feel as if the person is beside you.
 
back to top
Fantasy Library: Harnessing the power of the spoken word
Fantasies are natural and positive elements of a woman's sexuality. Women who fantasize show higher rates of satisfaction. Women's fantasies tend to be less graphic and more emotional and intimate than men's. That's why we created a library of audio stories that will usher you away into an exciting world of fantasy. We provide a comprehensive library for you to find a fantasy that suits your mood. Each Fantasy contains audio and non-explicit images. It does not contain any video.

 
Create Your Own Customized Fantasies
If you can't find any fantasies that suit your mood. The Fantasy App allows you to record your partner's voice and insert the varying levels of vibration to coincide with the audio content. The vibrations are fully customizable. Once you finish recording, you can replay it whenever you want to. Creating your own customized fantasies with your partner is fun, exciting and will surely add to the physical and emotional richness of your relationship.
You can even upload your own personal fantasy to the Fantasy Library and let other people listen to your fantasy.

Long Distance Intimacy
With the Vibease Intimate App, long distance relationships just might become people's preference. The Vibease Intimate app allows your partner to control the vibrations from anywhere in the world. It doesn't matter if your partner is in the office or in another country, you can still have your intimate moments. Distance doesn't matter.


The app has a private messaging system for you to share intimate conversations. And most importantly, your partner can create special moves and vibrations to give you a pleasant surprise.
If you're in a long distance relationship, you definitely need to have the Vibease Intimate App. 

back to top
 
Vibrator design and specifications
We carefully designed the Vibease Smart Vibrator with modern women in mind. We wanted to make something both discreet and beautiful. The Vibease Smart Vibrator is designed for clitoral stimulation. Statistics indicate that 80 percent of women require clitoral stimulation to attain orgasm.
Vibease vibrator is small, measuring only 3.1 inches long. Good things really do come in small packages :) It is made from 100% body-safe silicone for a soft and comfortable feeling. Other features of the Vibease Smart Vibrator include:

Compatible with most Android phones and latest iPhones.

Strong vibrations with customizable pulsations to provide as realistic an experience as possible.
Rechargeable battery lasting up to three hours. The battery can be charged through USB.
Waterproof and easy to clean.
Can be used as a standalone vibrator in case you don't have your smartphone.
Communicates with your smartphone via Bluetooth connectivity. Bluetooth 2.1 for the Android app and Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) for the iPhone app.

back to top


 
Wearable
Making the vibrator small, discreet and wearable is the one of the top requests we received from women for numerous reasons:

Mandatory for complete immersive experience. You can relax and enjoy your moment.
A total hands-free experience and your fingers will not get tired.
Discreet. No one will know that you're having a good time.

We spent much time designing a comfortable, wearable vibrator. We wanted to create something easy to use, allowing women to slip it inside the undergarment whenever they wanted. After many different designs we found the solution by redesigning the tip. The tip is specially designed to make it easy for women to locate the sweet spot while ensuring the vibrator remains steadily in place. We do not recommend wearing the Vibease vibrator during outdoor activities.

Vibease Apps
We are currently finishing development of two Vibease apps: Vibease Fantasy and Vibease Intimate. It will be available in both Android and iPhone versions. We will release the app in September before we ship the vibrators. The apps will be free to all Vibease customers. During the process we will invite our early backers to test our apps and provide valuable feedback. Currently we have a beta app for Android. 
back to top

This is just the beginning. We have more exciting apps in the pipe line. Our research and development team is working hard to design and create more exciting Vibease apps that will enrich you and your partner's lives and relationship.
 
 
Risks and Challenges
There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product on a large scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development. Not all electronics manufacturers created equal. Every manufacturer has their own expertise, because every product has its own manufacturing challenges. The quality of our product was of paramount concern. We will not deliver a mediocre product. The devil is in the details, which is why selecting the right manufacturing partner was a top priority.



Successful business organizations surround themselves with experts. After vetting several candidates, we partnered with one of the biggest sex toy manufacturers in China to ensure the Vibease would meet our high manufacturing standards in terms of safety, quality and reliability. We've been working with our manufacturing partners for the past few months, perfecting the product to make it ready for mass production. They have manufactured high-quality vibrators for some of the most famous sex toy brands in the US and Europe. By working with experienced sex toy manufacturers, we have reduced the hardware-related challenges significantly, and avoided costly mistakes.
However, there is always the risk of unexpected circumstances delaying our delivery. We assure you that we will work hard to mitigate those risks. We plan to be 100% transparent throughout the delivery process.
back to top
 
MEET THE TEAM 
back to top
THANK YOU FOR BELIEVING IN US!
We'd like to thank everyone who has helped us out along the way.

HAXLR8R's guidance on how to build this kickass product and navigate the challenge of finding the most suitable manufacturing partner was invaluable. Thank you to all the mentors.
Fellow HAXLR8R startups, it has been so much fun to work together and brainstorm with other hardware founders and hackers. The atmosphere was charged with positive energy. Spark, Yee Link, BlinkiVerse, Helios Bars, Fabule, Lightup, Hex Air Robot, and Molecule Synth – thank you for your support. We also want to thank Nomiku, Gtar, and Lightup. Thank you to all the girls Vanessa, Amanda, Silvia and Qi Yu. Thank you Joyce from Microsoft BizSpark & Windows Azure.
Thank you Selena Sol, for believing us since the beginning and your advice. 
Thank you Cindy Gallop, founder of MakeLoveNotPorn, for being the inspiration on how to change the world through sexuality. Words cannot express our gratitude!
Thank you Founder Institute and FI big family for being supportive since the beginning.
Thank you to all writers who featured Vibease. We are extremely humbled by the opportunity.
THANK YOU to all our users and supporters who want to be remained anonymous. You know who you are. It's all possible because of you. Thank you for all your feedback.
Last but Not Least, You! THANK YOU for your time. Please support our project and help us to spread the news. Every bits count! 
back to top
FAQ:
Which version should I get, iPhone or Android?
For long distance intimacy, this can be confusing. Get the vibrator based on the smartphone she is using. If she's using Android phone, get Vibease (Android), if she's using iPhone, get Vibease (iPhone). To control from long distance, you can use both iPhone and Android.
Does Vibease support Windows phone and Blackberry?
Due to limited resources, at this moment, we don't have a plan to develop app for Windows phone and Blackberry. As we're focusing to deliver the vibrators :) If there is a demand, we will look into it after we shipped the first batch of vibrators.
Do we ship Internationally and what are the shipping costs?
All shipping in the US is free of charge. Estimated shipping cost to Canada is $10 and an estimated $15 for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. International shipping fee varies due to diffrent import policies in every country. We will inform you if the shippping fee exceeds the estimated cost. At this moment, we can't confirm the shipping fee for every country until we have a complete picture of the international market. We also need to wait until we have the final packaging. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will do a full refund.
Does Vibease work with all Android phones?
Vibease works with Android phones with version 2.3 and onwards that have Bluetooth built-in. Technically, it can work with all Android 2.3 with Bluetooth, but we have realized that there is a chance where certain models might not work with Vibease due to the huge varieties of Android phones.
Does Vibease work with Android Tablets?
No, it doesn't work on Android Tablets. Email us and we will keep you posted when it can run on Android tablets.
Does Vibease work with all iPhones, iPods and iPads?
We are using Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) for the vibrator. For connecting the Vibease vibrator to iOS device, it ONLY works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 and later, iPod Touch 5th Generation and later. iPad (3rd gen & 4th Gen), and iPad Mini. However, all iOS devices with Internet connectivity will be able to connect to another smartphone remotely, and control the vibrator that is attached to that smartphone.
What is the maximum distance that Bluetooth can control the vibrator at?
The Vibrator works within 10 feets from the smartphone. For long-distance remote control, the connection is made through internet between the two phones. For instance, Amy in San Francisco connects to her vibrator using BLuetooth. For John who is in New York to control Amy's vibrator, he has to setup a connection to Amy's phone over the internet through the Intimate app. As long as both phones have internet, distance doesn't matter.
Do you need the phone to be same models in order for the long distance to work?
No. Android devices can connect with iOS devices. Digital love is blind after all.
What will appear on your credit card bill for your purchase?
Vibease purchase transaction will appear on your credit card bill as "VPL".
How to contribute anonymously?
You can choose whether or not you want your name and contribution amount to be displayed on the campaign page under the 'Contributors' tab. Choose 'Visible' if you want both your name and amount displayed, 'Identity-Only' if you want only your name displayed without your amount, and 'Anonymous' if you want only your amount displayed. Learn More
Still have questions?
No worries. Email us at info [at] vibease [dot] com. We will be more than happy to assist you.
back to top
Vibease® is a registered trademark in the U.S. and other countries.

story:
I want to you to help me to help the Hope Foundation for Cancer Care.
The money you donate goes directly to the charity, I don't touch any of it.

一日雙塔為了抗癌

On November 1  I'll set out from the very Northern Tip of Taiwan and attempt to cycle to the very Southern Tip of Taiwan...520km within 24 hours.

I don't guarantee I'll complete it in 24 hours (or at all). And since I am not in the best of health, frankly, it won't be easy. But I am going to try, because there's far bigger challenges facing people in this world than hopping on a bicycle and taking a casual ride across a lovely island.

Battling against cancer is one of the toughest challenges any person will face, and the reality is more and more of us will face that challenge at some time in our lives.

Hope Foundation helps people cope and fight by offering support, counseling and medical advice. It's a non-religious foundation I have visited personally, and was impressed by their dedication and with the fact that the vast majority of their resources go toward providing trained professionals to anyone who walks in the door or picks up the phone.

So if I can jump on a bike, you can donate a few dollars.
Thanks for your support.

Tim

story:
This campaign is over, but About-Face is back and bigger than ever, with the sequel,

Give Everybody a Bikini Body 2: #Bikinis4All!


And we also launched an awareness campaign we hope will go viral, called the #Bikinis4All Dare. Yep, we dare you. 

Thank you for all of your support!


Our video above tells you all about our campaign and what our 8-session About-Face media and body image programs can do for girls! We're raising money to lead another of these in the fall.


The Upshot: About-Face equips women and girls with tools to understand and resist harmful media messages that affect their self-esteem and body image. For girls who feel poorly about their bodies, depression, self-harming, eating disorders, and even suicide are real (and really bad) outcomes. In this campaign, we are raising money to bring our 8-session media and body image program to young women in the San Francisco Bay Area who couldn't afford it otherwise. Make your contribution and get some great perks!


What It's All About

Does the simple phrase “pool party” send you or someone you love running for the hills? Us too. That’s why it’s time to give every body a bikini body this summer through the power of media literacy.

Since 1997, About-Face has taught girls to understand and question their media environment, including unrealistic beauty ideals that leave so many women worried about taking off their swimsuit cover-up so they can hop in the pool and have fun with their friends and families.

It’s time for you to make a splash with your contribution to this About-Face campaign! The campaign funding will go toward providing an 8-session About-Face program for young women in San Francisco this fall.


Why Girls Need You

Young women are feeling a lot of pain, fear, and anxiety in dressing rooms all over the United States, where they’re trying on swimsuits, shorts, dresses, and all kinds of other summer clothes — the kind of feelings that make them not want to even go to the pool party, the beach, the garden party, the 4th of July BBQ. What will they miss out on?

In fact, for girls who feel poorly about their bodies, it's serious: Girls suffer from depression, self-harming, eating disorders, and even commit suicide.

Last fall, when we asked girls in our Media Advocacy Group at Washington High School to come up with one of the top body-image issues they face as girls, they told us that the sizing at stores made them feel poorly and less likely to do the things they want in life. Here’s what they told us.

“Now I look at media and advertisements in a whole new way. I don’t compare myself to people in magazines or music videos. I feel more confident and secure with who I am." 

“You always think ‘I’m the only one’. But hearing about how it’s a big issue, it doesn’t make you feel weird about yourself.” 
“It felt great to find fault in the ads rather than using the ads to find fault in ourselves.”


The About-Face Impact

About-Face is making real change. With our sassy, humorous, and interactive brand of media education, we have demonstrated students' improvement in:

  • Body satisfaction
  • Ability to question media messages
  • Self-esteem

About 1,500 students were given surveys in this study. Research by Kjerstin Gruys (below), who received her PhD in Sociology from UCLA.

Here's Kjerstin, who does our program evaluation and just got her PhD!


What We Need to Help Girls

Here's what we want to do:


  • Meeting our $7,555 goal will enable us to put on an 8-session About-Face media and body image program for young women in high school that will give them critical-thinking skills, improve their body image, and find their power to take action. 
  • 15 teenage girls will participate in this program at a San Francisco Bay Area school that can't otherwise afford it.
  • We only need 300 people to give $25 each to make our goal and provide this crucial education! 


This is Tanya, our Program Coordinator, who makes it all happen!


What You Get

Pick your perk, and we're on our way!

Our NEWEST perk, added July 9, is our exclusive Covert Dressing Room Action Kit! With your contribution of $50, you get the key pieces you need to do an action just like our Covert Dressing Room Action! We’ll send you:

- 18 static-cling decals with inspiring phrases (6 designs, 3 of each design)

- 1 Covert Instruction and Tips sheet for doing the action on your own or with a group

- 20 Points for Reflection sheets to post in fitting rooms

Just pick "Paper Training Suit" as your Perk level!


Other Perks:

  • Awesome Covert Dressing Room Action 6-decal sets made by girls in an About-Face program
  • Fab "Women&Girls&Media&Body&Image" T-shirt, exclusive to About-Face (prototype above)
  • Your name in the credits of the short film about this curriculum
  • Invitation to attend a session of the program (via video or in person)
  • Special thank-you cards and "video hugs"
  • Mystery perk! A souvenir, sticker, publication, or other product made by the young women as part of the upcoming 8-session About-Face program.
  • A fun campaign supporter meet-and-greet in the San Francisco Bay Area
  • Be a named sponsor of an About-Face workshop for 10-25 young women.
  • Lunch, dinner, or movie night with the terrific young women from the 8-session About-Face program and their super-fun group leaders.



Other Ways You Can Help

Here are some other high-impact ways you can help About-Face.

  • Share this campaign via Facebook, Twitter, and other social media via the Indiegogo share tools (top of this page). The more times you share it, the better!
  • Volunteer to work with About-Face doing activism, outreach, or leading workshops at schools! 


Updates!

Check out this update video from June 27! 

And see our other updates in the Updates tab above or by clicking here.


Thank You!

Thank you so much for having a look at the Give Everybody a Bikini Body campaign. No matter what your giving or helping level, we're thrilled to have you!

Lunch, dinner, or movie night with the terrific young women from the 8-session About-Face program and their super-fun group leaders.

Here are some other high-impact ways you can help About-Face.
Share this campaign via Facebook, Twitter, and other social media via the Indiegogo share tools (top of this page). The more times you share it, the better!Volunteer to work with About-Face doing activism, outreach, or leading workshops at schools! Updates!

story:
Hey everyone, Duke of the Bump here. I'm raising some funds for some upcoming dental work. My insurance and savings will cover some of it, but I need quite a bit of work done, so I'm reaching out to fans of my LPs and streams to help me pay the costs. If there's a game you ever wanted to see me play, now's your chance. Every little bit helps. Thanks so much for your support.

Available Xbox 360 games: Darksiders, Deadly Premonition, Deathsmiles, Lost Odyssey, Final Fantasy 13, Braid, Super Meat Boy, Iron Brigade, Sonic 4 episode 1, Castle Crashers, Banjo-Kazooie, Worms 2: Armageddon, Megaman 9, Shadow Complex,  Splosion Man, Spelunky, and Bomberman Live.

 

(note: if you request your game streamed live, I'll work around your schedule as much as I can, but unless the stream is done on a weekend it'll have to be between 4:00 PM and 10:00 PM EST (between 21:00 and 03:00 UTC.)

story:
Short Summary

      Aloha everyone! My name is Matthew Vincent, I was born and raised on the beautiful Island of Maui. I created this fundraiser for my good friend named Matthew Swift, who I grew up surfing with everyday. He is a talented surfer with an extremely positive personality keeping the island style "Aloha Spirit" through life's up's and down's.  He recently fell off a TWO STORY BUILDING while working a construction job resulting in a shattered heel and multiple broken bones in his foot.

      Matthew Swift is undergoing 3 surgeries each 8-10 hours long to repair his badly injured foot. He has a minimum of 6 months of recovery and rehabilitation to learn how to walk again. 

      Matt is the kind of person who never asks for anything and is stoked on life, please help me raise money to get a custom shaped surfboard that will be presented to him in order to keep him motivated and positive throughout his recovery. If you surf then you know how it feels to get a new board, especially riding one.

    The Board will be shaped by CARROZZA SURFBOARDS out of Long Beach, CA. I will personally complete the artwork/graphics, and extra $ will go towards a deck pad, leash, fins, and gear to get this surfer back in the ocean!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support the fundraiser financially, spread the word by sharing this link or tell your friends!

story:
Short Summary

Infinite Opportunities, Inc. - a non-profit organization - is raising funds to remodel  a location and purchase equipment to start our gym in the neighborhood of Covington, Ga.Your donation makes a huge difference in how quickly we can get our gym doors open and how many kids we can serve. We are currently working on applying for our 501(c) 3 status . We have a Sponsor in place which will allow us to provide tax credit for donation. 

What We Need

  • We need $20,000 to build out space for gym.
  • We have community people to volunteer so there is alot of manpower.
  • We are in need of equipment as well
  • If we don't reach our goal we will  divide our project in to smaller Phases and use the monies we have to do Phase 1 of the project

The Impact

We know that this will impact young people in such a positive way.

    • Our mission to assist young people with not only development of tremendous physical talents, but other attributes in areas of math, science, music, social and entrepreneurial acumen also. But a lack of order, direction, discipline, prioritizing, faith, focus, mentoring and nurturing has suppressed or discouraged these potential “Rising Stars” to come into the fullness of themselves.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please share this with other and help us get the word out, post on your Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Share our Campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.
