the saddest face as he explained they were 95 % sure Sean had Leukemia:
It took a few
min to sink in and then I couldn't stop crying and begging the doctor not to let
him die . Whatever he needed, my blood. bone marrow, whatever I can give to him
to save him. Just please don't let my baby die
An Oncologist explained he would require an emergency transfusion
right away and then we literally went from the ER to the Oncology ward (3B)
where we were supposed to have stayed for 3 weeks. I was in a cot beside his
bed for almost 9 weeks, as he developed many I fractions- blood, fungal, etc.
and he list the ability to walk for several weeks too due to one of the chemos.
He continues to take daily chemo, steroids,
Septra, Methatrexate and more in addiition to monthly Lumbar Punctures where he
goes to BCCH , put under GA , Methatrexate is injected into his spine and they
extract spinal fluid which is taken to the lab to examine for presence of
cancer cells. With Leukemic patients, if they do relapse , quite often it is in
the brain or spinal fluid.Update on Sean

 We saw Dr.Rod today and again I gave to say how very blessed we feel to
 have him as Seanny 's oncologist.He wants to move on Sean's case very 
quickly. Wed. am we'll have the biopsies done on both testicles and bone
 marrow. Sean will be admitted into BCCH indefinitely to begin treatment
 depending on biopsy results which Dr.Rod is working on getting 
expedited ASAP . Potential treatments discussed were more aggressive 
forms of chemo, radiation, removal of testicle and / or bone marrow 
transplant. I will keep you all posted as soon as I learn something from
 Dr.Rod. I just ask that you please continue to pray for my baby boy and
 send positive healing thoughts / vibes his way. Love, TinaThe News Isn't Good - An Update From Tina
Thank
 you all for your very kind messages of love and support for Seanny. He 
was a year away from the completion of his treatment for Leukemia and 
now he is starting at "Ground 0". As I have not heard a word regarding 
the leukemia spreading to his brain, I am assuming no news is good news 
on that front. Today, Sean begins phase 1 of very aggressive chemo and 
everything that entails- nausea, mouth sores,
 hair loss. In several weeks he will then start radiation, leaving him 
infertile. Lastly, he will undergo a bone marrow transplant. This means 
he'll be in total isolation for between 3-4 months. Fortunately , Sean's
 older brother , Dylan is a perfect match for Seanny- blessing #1. Blessing #2, we have a great room up on 3B with a comfortable cot thanks to Tanna Fleming who vacated the room yesterday and asked the nurses  if we could get this room.
 Right now, Sean is in a great deal of pain, and is taking morphine 
every 4 hrs. Please continue to keep him in your thoughts and prayers. I
 know with all Seanny's tenacity, your amazing words of support, our 
wonderful oncologist, Dr.Rod and the nurses here at BCCH , we are going 
to give this beast a run for its money!!

Spray for Life 

The most technologically advanced dietary supplements available on the market today. A result of over 16 years of development and the first patented nanotechnology nutriceutical process filed in the U.S. Patent & Trademark Office.

When you step up to Spray For Life®, you get the latest Molecular Dispersion Technology™ with benefits far above any other dietary supplements. No longer any need to settle for the rest, when you and your family deserve the very BEST!

This unique delivery system is designed to maximize the product effectiveness in a wide variety of ways and here are just some of the benefits that apply:

  • Increased Absorption
  • Faster Onset of Action
  • Increased Bioavailability
  • No Swallowing Difficulties
  • Increased Stability and Shelf Life
  • Lower Dosing Can be Utilized For Effectiveness
  • No Excipients (binders, fillers, shellac, wax, etc.)
  • Increased Cellular Penetration, Activity & Function
  • Eliminate the First Pass Taxation to Liver and Kidneys
  • More Efficacious While Decreasing Any Adverse Side-Effects

This 21st century formulation process is designed to maximize the nutritional ingredients capabilities, as nature intended. Now, you can get all this in these most popular proven vitamin supplement formula.


For every 20 dollar investment a bottle of spray for life will be sent to charities around the world utilizing major celebrities and charities to help less fortunate people worldwide. Our marketing campaign will consist of 3D platform and graphics with a new app and inventory to supply current purchase orders.

The marketing phase 1 will include donations to Africa and Haiti with major sporting events with Formula-e all electric car race and Shannon Briggs fight to regain heavyweight champion with Akon Konfidence foundation contributions and interaction.

  • We are working on cures for major health problems with nanotechnology
  • See www.sprayforlife.com
  • Help People who have problems taking pills
  • tell your friends buy a bottle donate a bottle program
  • share the spray for life

story:
MISSED THE CAMPAIGN?
The Kegel exerciser by Perifit is available at https://perifit.co

 

INTRODUCING PERIFIT

Your perfect pelvic floor trainer 

 

Perifit solves a problem most women don’t like to admit they have. Whether it's caused by having had a baby or just simply getting older, one in three women have pelvic floor weakness and problems with incontinence.

Although Kegel exercises are recommended by doctors for everything for getting back in shape after having a baby to preventing UTIs or recovering from bladder or kidney infections, most women don’t know exactly how, or even how often, to do them. In other words, Kegels don't work for most. And despite the proliferation of available products, wearing panty liners or pads aren't the answer most women want—especially if you prefer to lead an active life, free of worry.

Perifit offers you the solution you've been seeking. Fun, safe, and easy-to-use, it lets you train your pelvic floor muscles, improve your core strength, renew your confidence, and add a little extra something to your sexual enjoyment.

 

THE POWER OF CONTROL

Experience the many benefits of using Perifit

 

 

 

 

RAVE REVIEWS

 

WHY ARE PELVIC FLOOR MUSCLES IMPORTANT?

Strong pelvic floor muscles are a vital part of a healthy body. In particular, they are crucial in the following contexts:

  • Pregnancy: they are critically important during and after pregnancy, both in helping the body manage changes arising from the pregnancy and also in recovering more readily after birth.
  • Bladder control: they control the bladder and can prevent incontinence caused by stress, post-partum effects, aging, or other factors. Over 76% of women experience incontinence issues at some point in their life - strong pelvic floor muscles can prevent or resolve many of these problems without the complications of surgery.
  • Musculoskeletal stability: they support abdominal organs and provide stability for the entire pelvic region and lower spine; when weak or unstable they can cause back and pelvic pain.
  • Pleasure: they are an important part of a healthy sexual response for women. Strong pelvic floor muscles can enhance arousal and improve sensation, orgasm quality, and general sexual experience. 

However, despite the importance of pelvic floor muscles, tools to help exercise and manage them are extremely lacking. That’s where Perifit comes in...

 

 

WHAT IS PERIFIT ?

 

Perifit is a pelvic floor sensor wirelessly connected to a smartphone which helps you tone up your pelvic floor muscles. It measures the force exerted by squeezing your pelvic floor muscles and can communicate that information back to you via your smartphone. Using the device and corresponding app is like having a personalized gym and tracking system by your side whenever you want.

 

 

ABOUT THE APP

 

There is one training program that is made specifically for you

You can choose one of five training programs specifically designed to cover each type of pelvic floor condition. We worked with world-class physiotherapists, who have written books on pelvic floor exercise and training, to ensure you'll receive the best coaching for your pelvic rehabilitation. Here are the five training programs:

 

Game on!

Our experts have designed unique games to give your pelvic floor a full workout. It has never been as motivating and efficient to train your pelvic floor.

 

Track your performance

Get motivated by tracking your results on the dashboard. Improve week by week and beat your personal best!

 

EASY-TO-USE

It just takes 5 minutes

 

1. Step-by-step guidance for a great start

Our app will gently guide you through your first steps of training. You get a clear and simple explanation for every exercise you do and lots of advice for a perfect workout.

 

2. Place Perifit inside and play

Forget about those boring and repetitive workouts you had to do before Perifit. Our exercises are a series of fun smartphone games you play by using your pelvic floor muscles. Every level is carefully designed by world-class pelvic floor disorder specialists.

By contracting your pelvic muscles, the butterfly will fly up.

 

3. Track your progress

Our proprietary, unique data mining algorithms assess your individual pelvic floor performance against four key metrics—force, endurance, reflex, and agility. This enables your virtual coach to custom design a personal set of exercises for faster improvement.

Your sensor is only 0.8 inches wide. It fits all body types and sizes and measures your specific lift strength with exceptional accuracy. After each use, you can simply wash it with soap and water.

 

To get a truly efficient pelvic floor workout, you need to target both your superficial (shallow) and deep pelvic layers. Perifit is the only pelvic floor trainer which allows you to train and track both these layers to get the best results from your workout.

Sensor #1 measures vertical contractions in the superficial (shallow) pelvic floor zone and sensor #2 measures horizontal contractions in the deep pelvic floor zone.

 

DEMO

 

 

GUARANTEES

If you are not 100% satisfied, we’ll give you your money back. No questions asked!

 

 

MEET OUR TEAM

contact@perifit.fr

 

 

FAQ

Is my phone compatible with Perifit App ?

Perifit App is compatible with all smartphones and tablets:
- iPhone 4S and above 
- iPad 2 and above 
- Any Android tablet and smartphones with Android 4.4.4 and above

 

How does the Perifit connect with my smartphone ?

Perifit connects wirelessly with a Bluetooth Low Energy connection. We use this communication technology because of its low energy consumption and very low signal power. It's 100 times less powerful than your GSM or CDMA cellular phone networks!

 

Is the wireless signal harmful to my body?

We understand your concern and want you to feel 100% safe and stress-free. We designed Perifit so that all the signal "broadcasting magic" happens outside of your body on the tail of the Perifit. That means there won't be any signal going through your internal organs. A Wi-Fi signal is 100 times more powerful than Perifit's signal (Bluetooth Low Energy). In other words, Perifit is 100 times safer than your phone.

 

What is the material used to make Perifit ?

Perifit is covered by medical grade silicon Class VI certified.

 

Can you ship to my country?

We ship all over the world. Please check the different pledge offers and look up the shipping fees to your country.

 

Can I get a refund?

Absolutely. If you are not 100% satisfied, you can ask for a refund within 30 days of delivery, no questions asked.

 

How often should I use Perifit?

It all depends on your needs and condition. Every woman is different, so every pelvic floor is different, too. Like any other workout program, it needs to be tailored to your physical condition. For a pelvic floor workout, the rest cycle is also extremely important.

Therefore, we recommend you design your training schedule with a trained professional, either a physiotherapist or a women's health expert.

On average, patients that perform three (3) sessions per week, training from 10 to 15 minutes per session, achieve the best results.

 

What is the battery life of a Perifit?

The Perifit is designed for 1000 training sessions of 10 minutes. So, you are good to use Perifit for at least 5 years if you use it 3 times a week.

 

Is the Perifit waterproof?

Yes, Perifit is 100% waterproof and can simply be washed with water and soap. You could even go swimming with it—though we're not sure why you would do that!

 

Is it possible to use Perifit with a coil ?

Yes, that was tested and approved.

 

How can I ask a question to the Perifit team ?

Mail us your question, we will answer you directly and update this FAQ : contact@perifit.fr
